name: I wanted to be a Vampire! Not a Mosquito! [Monster Evolution LitRPG]
author: lemonleapoard
description: Steven lived a nice life. He had a job, a one room apartment, and even a cat. It was all going so well. So why did he die from a heart attack? But it's not all bad, he gets to reincarnate, and can even choose a special skill for himself! He'll be a vampire, and gain powers from drinking blood! Wait, why is everything so big? He's a mosquito?

reviews.title: Mostly the MC yelling at his system.
reviews.content:
Mostly the MC yelling at his system.
REVIEWED AT: 29. Spiders Suck
BY fredthebadger
4/8/2023, 1:14 PM

The main content of this story is the MC complaining about his system-granted abilities and quests, TO his system, and having his system and/or various gods operating through his system screw with him in response.

 

There's a lot of skill reading, but instead of sitting there thinking about how to min-max he complains and then has to deal with the consequences of his complaints being heard.  Once you're past the first few chapters the character is mostly established and you'll start getting an idea how all future conflicts will be handled, which means you'll know whether you want to keep reading.

 Report

chapters.name: 1. I Wanted a Vampire
chapters.content:
Day 0

Steven was having a nice day. His boss let him go home early because a snowstorm was coming down from the north, and he didn't want anyone to be stuck there for the night. Now, if you hadn’t seen the weather report, you’d assume Steven’s boss was going crazy. It was a bright day. The sun was shining, birds were chirping, sure it was a little chilly, but that happens every now and then.

So, Steven was happy. Even if he knew his power was probably going to go out tonight, it didn’t really matter, he’d live. Therefore, Steven got in his car with a smile on his face, and started it. He got on the highway, heading back into town. The road was kind of empty, so it was going to be a relaxing ride. Steven turned on his —

I felt a pain in my chest, not a really bad pain, but it still hurt. Next came the squeezing, it felt like my chest was being compressed. Then nothing, it was over in an instant. I slammed on my breaks. I tried to slam on my breaks? My breaks were gone. Wait, my car was gone, and the Earth was gone? I looked around to see nothing but a white, all encompassing void. It seemed to go on forever, with nothing else around for miles.

DING!

Congratulations! For being the 100,000th person to die this year, you will be reincarnated to another world!

Calculating Points…

What? I died? HOW?!? I was in my car with nobody else around!. I was going home to feed my cat! Let me go back! I want to at least make sure someone feeds Smoky!

Processing Request. Request Granted. Informing Someone to Feed Smoky.

Due to Limited Processing Capabilities Rewards are based on Country instead of World

Name: Steven Smith (Epic)

Gender: Male(Uncommon)

Job: Janitor (Rare)

Cause of Death: Heart Disease (Rare)

Age of Death: 21 (Legendary)

Additional Traits:

Adopted (Very rare)

Points:

Common (1 point) * 0 = 0

Uncommon (10 points) * 1 = 10

Stolen story; please report.

Rare (100 points) * 2 = 200

Very Rare (1000 points) * 1 = 1000

Epic (10000) * 1 = 10000

Legendary (100000 points) * 1 = 100000

Total: 111210 points

Calculating Rewards…

What was that? First of all, adopted? No way. My parents would have told me. And second, how the hell is dying from heart disease rare? It’s literally one of the most common causes of death! Well, at least I can rest assured that Smoky was fed. Wait, can I? What if this thing just told someone in China to feed Smoky!. Smoky! Are you okay?

Rewards Calculated:

Due to Limited Processing Ability Reward Choices are Limited

1 Unique Skill

2 Legendary Skills

22 Epic Skills

111 Very Rare Skills

222 Rare Skills

2242 Uncommon Skills

111210 Common Skills

Whoah, what’s this? I get skills? Does this mean it was telling the truth about being reincarnated? Wait, why do I get so many? Is this right? Does this mean I lived a good life? Fuck yeah, I am the best. Alright, how do I do this? Do I just tell it to give me my options? Alright! Let’s start with the unique Skill! System! Let me see my unique Skill options.

Reward Selected: 1 Unique Skill. Please Choose Skill.

Wait what? NO! I only get one?!?! Can I go back! I want all the Common skills then! Who needs a unique skill when I can get thousands of Common ones! I’ve seen webnovels before! I know the seemingly stupid option always leads to me being OP! C’mon!

Please Choose Skill

What skill? Can I have a list of options? How am I supposed to choose without seeing my options? What is this? Hello?

Unique Skills are made by the host's desire. As such the host must provide a wish that will be used to make a Unique skill.

What the hell? Well, at least that gives me options. At least this way I can still be OP. Let me think. What do people wish for? Eternal youth? That could be cool. Maybe to fly, or take other people’s powers. Hmm… What do I want? You know, as a kid I really liked those old vampire movies. Vampires are strong, hot, and get all the girls. Yes, that's it! I wish to be a vampire.

Processing Request…

Species Vampire Unknown, scanning hosts memories…

Wait what? It doesn’t know what a vampire is? Are there no vampires in this other world, uh oh. Wait, I take it back! I don’t want to be the only vampire! Give me another choice!

DING!

Unique Skill Bloodsucker created. Rewards finalized, deciding species based on skill compatibility…

Species Mosquito(Tier 0) found.

Does that say mosquito? At least I won’t be alone.

Reincarnating… Enjoy your new life!

chapters.name: 2. War
chapters.content:
Day 1

I woke up to a ringing in my ear? and a blue screen in front of my face. It was full of columns of strange, shifting shapes. They looked like an unstable alien alphabet, clearly containing meaning, but never the same meaning for long. I watched, mesmerized, as the letters morphed, and the columns turned to rows, until they eventually settled into something I could recognize. English, with my name near the top.

Due to being 100% compatible with body, Bloodsucker has been upgraded.

Name:

Gender: Male

Level: 0/5

Experience: 0/5

Age: 0 days

Expected Lifespan: 10 days

Race: Mosquito(Tier 0)

Stats:

Health: 1/1

Mana: 0/0

Strength: 0 .1

Agility: 0.2

Dexterity: 0.1

Intelligence: 100

Constitution: 0.05

Charisma: 1

Skills:

Bloodsucker+1(Lv 1)

Traits:

Blood Born

Super Fertile

Well, those are stats. And if I do say so myself I may be dead sooner rather than later. 10 days to live, if I even last that long. How do mosquitoes do it back on Earth? They just mate then die, right? Maybe I should look for a mate. Where even am I? At that thought, the screen slowly faded from view, and I saw the world around me for the first time.

I was surrounded by an ocean of red. All around me there were ripples in the ocean, from each one I saw a mosquito rising from red, the sun glistening off the droplets stuck on their bodies. One by one, they took off into the sky, and flew off into the distance.

Unauthorized use: this story is on Amazon without permission from the author. Report any sightings.

That looks so cool. Why did I ever want to be a vampire? Mosquitoes are so cool. I bet my skill is OP too, unique should be good, right? Alright let’s see it. System! What’s my skill do?
Please select skill to inspect

I only have one… Are you trying to mock me? Whatever, what does Bloodsucker do?

Bloodsucker+1(Lv 1):

Gain experience from consuming the blood of creatures, and when enough blood of a single species has been consumed, gain a random skill from their species.

+1 Can store 10x more blood. Blood is digested 30x faster.

Now this, this is what I call OP! HA! HAHAHAHAHA! I am a god! I will be a mosquito overlord! Nobody shall stop my triumphant rise! Except maybe fly swatters, or hands, or anything that can hit me… Alright, maybe there are a few kinks to work out, like that 10-day lifespan, but it’ll be fine! I’ll just get an eternal youth skill… In ten days… Whatever. These will be the best 10 days of my life! Or would it be my death? Wait… Hmmm.

As I stood contemplating whether or not this was considered the afterlife, I saw something from the corner of my eye. I saw my brother? sister? I’ll figure it out eventually, disappear. They were there for one second, and a flash of blue later and they were gone. Before I could figure out what was happening. A new screen popped up in my face.

NEW QUEST AVAILABLE!!

Survive the Swarm of Birds!

Success:

Survive until the swarm of birds has passed or have died.

Failure:

Death

Reward(s):

1 Common Skill

Accept Quest(Y/N)?

What the fuck?!?! Birds! I was just born! How am I supposed to survive a swarm of birds! They are practically built to kill mosquitoes! Oh, and wait, I accept! It’s not like I have any choice in the matter… I had to do this quest anyways.

All around me birds were picking mosquitoes out of the air one by one. Those who died got lucky, for it was better than the one that lived. Some managed to partially dodge the birds’ attacks, but never completely. Those who dodged always lost at least half their body and fell back down into the ocean. They came crashing down, twitching, and falling on the ocean. It was a massacre. It was war.

So, I did what all good soldiers do, I booked it. I started flapping my wings, only to realize one crucial mistake; I didn’t know how to fly! I struggled, flapping one wing then the other, but it was to no avail. So, I tried the next best thing, and luckily for me it was something I had practice with. I ran. I mean, it was a little different from running as a human, having six legs and not being on solid ground didn’t help. But I did pretty good if I do say so myself. I stumbled at a pace akin to a crawling baby. Wait, a crawling baby it was the size of mosquito, whatever.

Slowly but surely, I made it out of the death zone. With mosquitos dying all around me, I prayed to the mosquito god to help me survive this, I was just reborn, I didn’t need to die already. I just wanted to find a mate. Eventually, after what felt like hours, I heard the ding that warned me of my impending doom.

Quest “Survive the Swarm of Birds!” Completed

Reward(s):

Common Skill Fly(Lv 1)

That would have been useful earlier.

Thanks to actions taken during quest, additional reward(s) obtained.

Common Skill Pray(Lv 1)

…

comments.comment_text: Nosferatu has nothing on our hero!
this absurd intelligence is clearly not reflected, no sense! omg

replies.comment_text: I understand you might be joking, but just in case, I think the intelligence is relative to his current form, and thus it is required for him to have higher thought.

chapters.name: 3. Flying?
chapters.content:
Day 1

…Well, at least I can fly now, right? What do these skills do anyways? System! Show me my skill descriptions!

Please select skill to inspect

Oh, right, let’s start with the good one! Show me Fly!

Fly(Lv 1)

Gives users with wings knowledge on how to use them.

Alright, pretty basic but lots of potential. Maybe I can learn to do tricks eventually. That’d be hilarious, a mosquito doing loop de loops. I bet someone would give me food for that. Or maybe squash me for being a devil bug… Oh well, a man —wait mosquito— can dream! So, what does pray do?... Hello? System? What does pray do?

Pray(Lv 1)

Sends the thoughts to a deity in hopes for interference or a boon.

Current Target: Mosquito God(+)

That doesn’t seem ominous at all… Ooo, there’s a plus sign, what does that do?

Mosquito God(Unborn):

Patron god of mosquitos.

Well, that makes everything clear. Yes, the unborn patron god of mosquitos. I know exactly what they do. Thanks a lot, system. Whatever, I’ll figure it out eventually. More importantly, time to test out these wings of mine. I did what came(mostly) naturally to me and started almost beating my wings. Except, oddly enough, I didn’t just beat them. Right near the top and bottom of my strokes, I gave them a bit of a rotation, weird. Well, it just goes to show that I am clearly superior to birds(I don’t mean it please don’t hurt me birds).

Pray level up. Charisma multiplier is now 1.01x

OOOO, awesome! System, show me my stats!

Name:

Gender: Male

Level: 0/5

Experience: 0/5

Age: 0 days

Stolen content warning: this tale belongs on Royal Road. Report any occurrences elsewhere.

Expected Lifespan: 10 days

Race: Mosquito(Tier 0)

Stats:

Health: 1/1

Mana: 0/0

Strength: 0 .1

Agility: 0.2

Dexterity: 0.1

Intelligence: 100

Constitution: 0.05

Charisma: 1.01

Skills:

Bloodsucker+1(Lv 1)

Fly(Lv 1)

Pray(Lv 2)

Traits:

Blood Born

Super Fertile

Hahaha. HAHAHAHAHA! I have become stronger! Thank you, Mosquito God! I shall continue to pray to you every day! (No level?) If this is how this works, I’ll be OP in no time. I’ll just level my skills to the max and then nobody can stop me! Even if I’m a mosquito! Alright! Let’s get back to flying!

Where was I? Oh right, rotating my wings.Yes, I rotated my wings at the top and bottom of my strokes, and… Liftoff? Hmm… Maybe I just need some energy, yes that’s it, I haven’t eaten since my death. Alright, let’s find some sucker to snack on. Where can I find blood?

Blood Born activated

What? In an instant my senses changed. The ocean around me went from a dark, brooding red to a blinding blue in an instant. It was like when you’re trying to sleep and someone turns on the lights. TURN IT OFF!!! OFF I SAY!!!

Blood Born deactivated

What was that? Blood Born? Oh right, my trait. I probably should have checked that earlier. System! What does Blood Born do?!?!

Blood Born:

Requirements - Born in a pool of blood.

Increases attunement to blood by 10%. Highlights nearby sources of blood.

What a second… Does that mean what I think it means? This ocean… is blood? That’s… a lot of blood. How the hell do you even get this much blood in one place!?!?! There has to be gallons upon gallons of it here! And how doesn’t it all just evaporate and dry up?!?!?!?! Alright, calm down, Let’s think about this positively. At least I have an unlimited source of food. RIght. Yeah, yeah/ Just think of it as an all you can eat buffet… of blood… possibly human… NO! NO! NO! There’s no guarantee of that! Maybe this is just where a city leaves the blood after butchering animals, unsanitary sure, but it’s better than having it all in one place.

Alright, where was I? Oh yes, a drink. Right. Let me just… How do I drink?

20 minutes later

Alright, I think I’ve got this. So, I take these spears attached to my face. I stick them in the pool. And then I suck. I said I suck. SUCK GODDAMMIT! And we’re sucking! Alright, all it needed was a little yelling. Now how does this taste… You know what? This isn’t that bad. It kind of tastes like iron. I could get used to this… And I think.. I’m.. done.

Bloodsucker+1 activated. Human(Lv MIXED) blood(old) consumed. + 8 exp. 0.002% progress to human skill.

Level up!

+5 stat points

I’m sorry, what? That was what type of blood? Fuck.

Gained Status Poisoned(Minor).

Double fuck.

chapters.name: 4. Dragonfly
chapters.content:
Day 1

Poisoned(MInor):

Lose 2% of max health per hour.

There goes my 10 days… That gives me what, 50 hours? Alright… Still better than nothing. Who am I kidding? This sucks. I died to what I can only assume was a freak of nature heart attack, then after being given a chance to start anew, got stuck in the body of a mosquito, which only had 10 days to live, may I add. Where is the justice here? Where is my OP skill?

Alright, actually, I’ll give, I do have an OP skill, but… WHAT USE IS IT IF I CAN’T EVEN LIVE LONG ENOUGH TO USE It?!?!? You know what? I am going to fulfill my duty! I will find a mate! After figuring out how to fly… Alright, I’ve got this!

Slowly, I started beating my wings again. Doing what came naturally (Is it natural if the system had to give me a skill for it?). And, after another five minutes, I flew! Okay, maybe flew is a little generous. I got a good 3 inches off the ground (which is way higher than I am tall) and started plummeting back to the ground? (blood?) Is it considered ground since I can walk on it? Not the point! The point is, I was flying! Now, to repeat, and find some of my brethren!

4 minutes later and I made a very upsetting realization. I was lost. I may or may not have run (more like waddled) in a random direction away from those bloodthirsty birds. And I also may or may not have seen another mosquito for a few hours now. But, on the bright side, I am an expert in flying. I can make it up a total of 3 feet, reliably, and another foot unreliably.

Fly level up. Dexterity multiplier is now 1.01x.

WOOOO!!!! What the hell is that!?!?!

Off in the distance, a green blur was rushing towards me. It was moving way faster than me, and charging me like a train. And me, being the amazing, upstanding genius that I am, acted in a way befitting only the bravest of heroes. I turned around and flew at max speed. Which, while not very quick, was a decent bit quicker after my new level in Fly. Not that it helped. This thing was on me in an instant.

In an instant, there was a flash of green, and a soaring pain across my leg. Realizing I would never be able to escape, I used my amazing agility, and performed a maneuver about as gracefully as a dying cat. I turned around, stabbed my spears into its abdomen, and started sucking. Now, I would like to say that the stupid bug turned to a shriveled raisin in an instant under my superior powers of bloodsucking.

This narrative has been purloined without the author's approval. Report any appearances on Amazon.

But it did not. Sure, it slowed down a little, but, uhh… Let’s just say seeing how well that was working, I learned first hand what a slasher movie looks like. When sucking its blood didn’t work, the bug tried to get its mandibles around my body. It leaned its head up and started to close them like lightning.

Barely dodging the blow that would have undoubtedly cut my short life even shorter,I flew a little higher and landed on its back. What occurred next was nightmare fuel. I took my spears and stabbed at it again, and again, and again. Green blood squirted out of it like a bucket with a hole in it, until it eventually stopped moving.

Dragonfly(Lv 3) killed. + 5 exp.

Skill Aerial Combat obtained.

And I finally had my first kill under my belt. And, even though I had never heard of a mosquito eating a dragonfly before, I couldn’t waste my chance at some free xp, so, I did what had to be done and sucked that dragonfly dry.

Bloodsucker+1 activated. Dragonfly(Lv 3) blood(fresh) consumed. + 2 exp. 10% progress to dragonfly skill.

Level up!

+5 stat points

Oh yeah! Another level up! And some stat points which I completely forgot to use last time… oops. Well then, you live and you learn. System! I wanna use my stat points! And, lo and behold, I finally got a chance to get stronger.

Please select stats to put points into. (10 Available)

Strength: 0 .1

Agility: 0.2

Dexterity: 0.101

Intelligence: 100

Constitution: 0.05

Charisma: 1.01

Hey uh, system, out of curiosity, could you tell me what each stat does? I don’t want to make a stupid mistake.

Strength: Increases damage of physical skills and slightly increases max health.

Agility: Increases maneuverability and effectiveness of movement skills.

Dexterity: Increases fine motor controls and the ability to hit a target with all skills.

Intelligence: Increases max mana and ability to store and recall information

Constitution: Increases defense against physical attacks and max health.

Charisma: Increases likability to creatures perceived as friends. Increases intimidation against enemies. Improves effectiveness of all speech related skills.

So, that’s a lot… But what do I need the most? Looking back at myself, and my most recent debacles. Something becomes clear. I lost my leg in that fight. AND IT FUCKING HURTS! OW OW OW OW OW! Wait, no it doesn’t? It’s back? Huh? Cool. Let’s chalk that up to level up shenanigans and move on. Now then. In theory, with more max health I can survive the poison for longer, and maybe not lose a leg? (I think I lost it at least). So! System! Put them all into constitution!

Processing Request…

Constitution: 10.05

Wait, that’s a big increase. Maybe I can become a god… Or at least as strong as a human.

ERROR! Attribute Point cannot increase a stat by more than 10% of its base value.

Compensating…

Constitution: 0.1

Oh…

chapters.name: 5. Sleep
chapters.content:
Day 1

Name:

Gender: Male

Level: 2/5

Experience: 0/15

Age: 0 days

Expected Lifespan: 10 days

Race: Mosquito(Tier 0)

Stats:

Health: 1.5 / 1.5 Poisoned(Minor)

Mana: 0/0

Strength: 0 .1

Agility: 0.2

Dexterity: 0.101

Intelligence: 100.

Constitution: 0.1

Charisma: 1.01

Skills:

Aerial Combat(Lv 1)

Bloodsucker+1(Lv 1)

Fly(Lv 2)

Pray(Lv 2)

Traits:

Blood Born

Super Fertile

So, let me get this straight. I get stuck into the body of a mosquito, have abysmal stats, then when I get a chance to improve them… I’M TOO WEAK FOR THEM TO GIVE ME FULL BENEFITS!?!?! That’s about as fair as everything else has been though… DEMAND A REFUND!!!

Refund of Attribute Points available for 5 Attribute Points. ALRIGHT, DOESN’T MATTER! I was going to find a mate! But, before that. That fight kinda took a bit out of me.

Stolen content warning: this content belongs on Royal Road. Report any occurrences.

How long do mosquitoes need to sleep anyways? It feels like I’ve only been awake for a few hours and already, it’s getting a bit more difficult to move my legs. Though that might be because I lost one of them… (I swear I did, I’m not crazy). Anyways, it’s probably time to say goodbye to this world.

I need to sleep. In this open field(pond?), with nobody to protect me from birds, or dragonflies, or… are there fish here? Doesn’t matter! So, as this will most likely be my last day on… Planet 2? Unless….

Oh dear mystical Mosquito God, please keep me alive for another night! I promise to serve and believe in you with all my heart if I don’t die! So, sleep… does it work the same as how humans do it? I’ll just close my eyes… close my eyes… CLOSE MY EYES!!!! It’s not working…

Alright, what am I missing? Am I tired? I’d say yes. Next, can I close my eyes? Nope. Hmmm, I’m halfway there… Alright, so I can’t close my eyes. Let’s see… how else do people get to sleep? They pass out if they’re exhausted, right? So, I just need to tire myself out!

So, getting back in the air, I spend the next ten minutes doing my best to do a loop de loop. And if I do say so myself, I think I did pretty good. I made it a full half a loop! I went down, then came back up to the height I was at to begin with (That’s definitely not the easy part. Going upside down will be the easy part, just wait.).

Fly level up. Dexterity multiplier is now 1.02x.

Yeah! Wait, no, trying to sleep, don't get excited… don’t get excited. I can’t do it! WOOOO! Level 3 fly! Alright, so, sleeeeep.

Yeah, no, this is not gonna work. Other options? Well, if I can’t close my eyes, there are other ways to make it dark out…

This is gross. Really. Really. Gross. I went over to the dragonfly husk that was floating where I left it. Proof of my conquest against the inferior bug. And then I… I… I stabbed a hole into its exoskeleton, and crawled inside. Now, I think I should make it clear what I just did. I opened up a hole in, and then crawled inside a gooey, oddly warm, exoskeleton. It was disgusting. The insides got stuck to my wings, and my legs were cramped from the tight space. And, worse yet, I actually fell asleep in there. In the body of a dead dragonfly that I sucked the life from.

But, overall, it was a decent rest, other than the fact that my wings were sticky and I could barely move my legs. And better yet, I woke up to a new notification.

Trait Blanket Of Enemies unlocked.

SYSTEM! SHOW ME MY NEW TRAIT!

Blanket Of Enemies:

Requirements - Use the body of an enemy as a blanket.

Increases the effectiveness of intimidation effects by 50%

That’s… not creepy at all. I am totally normal, I did nothing weird to gain this… rare was it? trait.

Life expectancy decreased to 9 days.

Age increased to 1 day.

Yeah, wait, who cares?!?! I’ll be dead in 9 days anyways! Now! Back to my mission! To find a mate! But first... What way should I go?

chapters.name: 6. Flying Master
chapters.content:
Day 2

So, if the sun is behind me, then that means that it is… A direction that I definitely know. But, just to make it easier, I will call it sun up. So, using sun up as my guide, I will go sun down! And maybe find the end of this pool, and a mate! I will leave my mark on the world! In the form of baby mosquitoes! And possibly malaria, how would I know if I have malaria? Hmmmmmm…. Perhaps I do since I’m poisoned? Is that how it works? Is poison transferrable? Well, I’ll find out later! For now, I will go sun down!

And, after fifteen minutes of mind numbing flying, I got a new notification, well, one I’ve seen before but.

Fly level up. Dexterity multiplier is now 1.03x.

Woo! But honestly not that useful! Continue!

But, 20 minutes later, something much more interesting happened.

Fly level up. Dexterity multiplier is now 1.04x.

Please choose level 5 specialization for Fly.

I get a specialization! Alright, granted, I have no idea what that means, but it sounds powerful! It better be powerful! I’ll bet it’s powerful. O’ almighty Mosquito God, please give me good options!

Pray level up. Charisma multiplier is now 1.02x

Alright System! Show me my options!

Fly(Lv5):

Thrusters:

Requirements - Fly(Lv5)

Increases the amount of thrust generated by wings.

Acrobatics:

Requirements - Fly(Lv5), Attempt to do mid-air tricks

Provides knowledge of basic mid-air tricks when Fly levels up.

Slicers:

Requirements - Fly(Lv 5), Have wings with thin edges

Provides knowledge on how to slice objects with the edge of wings when Fly levels up.

This story originates from Royal Road. Ensure the author gets the support they deserve by reading it there.

Current Sensors:
Requirements - Fly(Lv 5), Survive an ambush by a flying predator

Can sense the currents caused by flying objects within fifteen feet of wings.

Flying Combatant:

Requirements - Fly(Lv 5), Aerial Combat Skill, Beat an opponent in aerial combat

Increases the ability to precisely maneuver in air. Aerial Combat provides more knowledge when leveled up(Does not Apply Retroactively).

Holy Flight:

Requirements - Fly(Lv5), Pray(Lv 3), Pray skill targeted at a god that can fly

Increases the amount of thrust generated by wings. Pray skill is 5%(Level of Fly) stronger. Wings are imbued with holy energy and become 3%(Level of Pray) sharper and harder.

If I don’t pick Holy Flight, is that blasphemy? I did just pray, and get the level up that would make me able to get it thanks to that… and it isn’t that bad. But… MY DREAMS OF LOOP DE LOOPS!!! It’s fine! I can just practice! Yes! I can do this! It’s fine! Besides! I just need to think of this realistically, this is a good thing. My wings are gonna become super weapons! All I need to do is pray, and I will turn them into blades of death! Yes! It’s all good! I have no regrets!

SYSTEM! Give me Holy Flight!

Specialization Holy Flight chosen.

Mosquito God 0.0000000001% to birth.

You have obtained the attention of higher beings, beware, for they do not like the birth of new gods!

I’m sorry, what? Did I just do something wrong!?!?! WHAT DO YOU MEAN PERCENTAGE TO BIRTH? SYSTEM! SHOW ME THE DESCRIPTION OF MOSQUITO GOD AGAIN, PLEASE!

Mosquito God(Growing, 0.0000000001%):

Patron god of mosquitos.

That… seems different. DIdn’t that say Unborn before? Uh oh, did I just start a religion? No no no no. I did not. I did not such thing. All I did was pray to a god that apparently did not exist before. Yes, that’s it, I did nothing wrong.

Trait Blasphemy(Major) unlocked.

I did mostly nothing wrong? This can’t be that bad, right? It’s just a new god, why would they care so much? I’m sure the trait is nothing weird. System, show me blasphemy, please.

Blasphemy(Major):

Requirements - Commit a major act of defiance against the world’s most powerful group of higher beings.

Increases the effectiveness of holy skills targeted at gods against the world's most powerful group of higher beings by 50%.

Hahahahaha. HAHAHAHAHAHAHA! I’VE BEEN HERE FOR BARELY OVER A DAY! HOW DID I MANAGE TO STUMBLE ONTO A MAJOR ACT OF DEFIANCE!?!?! WHAT IS THIS!?!?! I WOULD LIKE A REFUND! LET ME BE DEAD! I DON’T NEED TO BE REVIVED!

This world sucks. I pray to a fake god and it causes nothing but problems, how is that fair!?!?! THEY DIDN’T EVEN EXIST!!! You know what? Those major gods can go disappear for all I care! I won’t have to deal with them for very long anyways!

Status Poisoned(Minor) removed.

See? Look? Everything’s going well. The sun is shining, I’m not poisoned, there are dark clouds looming over the horizon… Dark clouds getting closer… Dark clouds getting closer alarmingly fast.

Gained Status Disaster Magnet(Major).

Aww fuck.

comments.comment_text:
He shall rise

AND NONE WILL HAVE ENOUGH BLOOD TO SATE HIS HUNGER

ALL HAIL THE MOSQUITO GOD

chapters.name: 7. Storm
chapters.content:
Day 2

In an instant, the clouds were upon me. They pelted me with rain the size of cars(Okay maybe not, but compared to me they were the size of cars.). Actually, maybe I am human sized and everything else is too. This is a fantasy world… RAIN! Right, right, the deadly rain. It was pouring from the sky faster than an oil truck with a 3 foot hole in it.

The water all around me shook like an earthquake, drenching me even further. I took to the sky in an attempt to flee, my new levels in fly already pulling their weight. But the moment I got a few feet up, I realized my mistake. I went from being pelted on most of my sides to being attacked on all of them. I bobbed and weaved through the trucks of rain, barely skating through some of them.

But it was all for naught; I was struck by a droplet that the wind rushed up from below. It hit me like a hungry bear with nothing else to lose. I was smashed upwards into the sky, losing all control of my path. I plummeted back towards the water with nothing to brace my fall.

With nothing else to lose, I decided to try a desperate gamble, do the very same thing that got me into the mess, pray to the Mosquito God for help.

OH MIGHTY MOSQUITO GOD! PLEASE BLESS ME WITH YOUR BEAUTIFUL WINGS AND SHARP MOUTH SPEARS! I NEED TO MAKE IT OUT OF THIS ALIVE!

All around me, the world flashed in a brilliant red light, and a new notification appeared in front of me, this one just as concerning as the ones that appeared in the last few minutes, but on a much more fundamental level.

Congratulations! Job System unlocked!

Available Job(s):

Head Cultist of the Mosquito God

Blasphemer(Major)

Dissector

Spearman

Peasant

I don’t have a choice here, do I? I’m already committed… and it’s unique… aww hell. SYSTEM! MAKE ME A CULTIST!

Job Head Cultist of the Mosquito God chosen, as a Unique Job it is unable to be removed. Head Cultist of the Mosquito God locked into first job slot. Beware, the ire of higher beings is not to be taken likely.

Mosquito God 0.0000000005% to birth.

Trait Monster?(Legendary) unlocked.

This tale has been unlawfully lifted from Royal Road. If you spot it on Amazon, please report it.

Skill Messenger of the Mosquito God unlocked.

Skill Protection of Blood obtained.

Skill Bloody Ritual unlocked.

Skill Member Initiation unlocked.

Skill Lead Prayer unlocked.

All around me screens flashed before my eyes then disappeared within an instant. Vaguely still aware of what was happening, I felt the impulse to activate one of my new skills. All around me the blood from the pool rose up, and started to take shape around me. It formed into a cocoon that protected me from the wind and rain, and finally, all seemed calm again. I layed there, at the bottom of the dome, trying to understand what had just happened.

I sat there for what felt like hours, until I eventually just fell asleep, my brain too tired to even begin comprehending what had led to these events.

I woke up with a start as my protective dome fell around me. The blood around me was calm again, and I had time to think. The storm had passed, the only proof of its existence being that the blood had somehow become an even darker shade of red, as if the rain only purified it. I imagine if this had been a forest, the trees all around me would have been toppled and flown off into oblivion. So, to figure out what had happened, I called upon my trust status screen.

SYSTEM! SHOW ME MY STATUS!

Name:

Gender: Male

Level: 2/5

Experience: 0/15

Age: 2 days

Expected Lifespan: 8 days

Race: Mosquito(Tier 0)

Stats:

Health: 0.25 / 1.5

Mana: 0/47

Strength: 0.1

Agility: 0.2

Dexterity: 0.104

Intelligence: 100

Constitution: 0.1

Charisma: 1.02

Skills:

Aerial Combat(Lv 1)

Bloodsucker+1(Lv 1)

Fly(Lv 5)

Pray(Lv 3)

Jobs:

1. Head Cultist of The Mosquito God(Lv 1)

2. EMPTY

3. LOCKED

4. LOCKED

Job Skills (Head Cultist of The Mosquito God):

Bloody Ritual(Lv 1)

Lead Prayer(Lv 1)

Member Initiation

Messenger of the Mosquito God(Lv 1)

Protection of Blood(Lv 1)

Traits:

Blanket Of Enemies

Blasphemy(Major)

Blood Born

Monster?(Legendary)

Super Fertile

So… I’m a cultist now. Of a God that doesn’t even exist yet, but appears to be able to mess with me anyways. That’s… Not creepy whatsoever. Yup. I have no problems with this new development.

Status Disaster Magnet(Major) removed.

Gained Status Disaster Magnet(Max).

Yup, that sounds about right.

comments.comment_text: Thank you for the chapter. Will he ever evolve into a vampire? If so, it would be very funny if a vampire prayed to a mosquitoe God. Or will the God them self be a God of all things that suck blood?
Bro this is hella funny lol.
It says intelligence is 100. Is that a typo?
Would have chosen dissector or am I the only one that consider his choices not well thought out like vampire why will you want those weaknesses (ps: this is not for the author you doing a great job )

chapters.name: 8. I hate the Gods
chapters.content:
Day 3

Disaster Magnet(Max):

Become a harbinger of disasters. Wherever you go disasters of all nature will follow, be it storms or wars. Skills related to disasters (Storms, plagues, etc…) will be 10% more effective. Due to the immense pressure on the body and soul brought by this status, no other statuses can be obtained while it is active.

Duration: This ought to make things interesting, Mr. Reincarnator, don't forget to choose a name! - Elly, Goddess of Chaos ;)

Did… did I just get an emoticon wink from a goddess? What the hell?!?! Aren't gods supposed to be all knowing and vengeful or something? I know for certain they don't send emoticons. What is this Elly, a teenager?

NEW QUEST AVAILABLE!!

Don't Insult Elly, Goddess of Chaos, Pretty Much the Only God that can Mess with the Status of Reincarnators

Success:

Do not insult Elly

Failure:

Insult Elly

Reward(s):

5 Xp per day successfully

Penalty for Failure:

Life Expectancy -5 days

Accept Quest(Y)?

No? Where's my no options!?!?! What is this? Maybe if I ignore it, it will go away?

Quest "Don't Insult Elly, Goddess of Chaos, Pretty Much the Only God that can Mess with the Status of Reincarnators" accepted automatically.

Seriously? Is there no concept of free will here?!?! Non interference?!?! Don't I get to choose!?!?

Skill Messenger of the Mosquito God Provides a new quest!!!

Expand the Cult

Success:

Expand the Cult of The Mosquito God by 5 members before death.

Failure:

Die before expanding the Cult of The Mosquito God by 5 members.

Reward(s):

1 level in Head Cultist of the Mosquito God job.

Penalty for failure:

Soul will be given to the higher being with the most grudges against you.

Current Target: Illinois, God of Insects(+)

Accept Quest(Y/N)

See? This is how you ask a quest. With a choice, that I am most definitely going to say no to.

Messenger of the Mosquito God activated. Quest accepted.

I was complimenting you Mosquito God, and you do this!?!?! WHERE IS THE JUSTICE IN THIS WORLD!?!?! I DEMAND TO BE COMPENSATED! Besides the fact that I don't even remember doing anything to Illinois! I didn't even know they existed until now! Unless they don't exist… SYSTEM! I WANNA SEE THAT PLUS ON ILLINOIS!

If you encounter this tale on Amazon, note that it's taken without the author's consent. Report it.

Illinois, God of Insects

Patron God of all insects (Ants, wasps, mosquitoes, etc…) and bringer of insect based disasters.

Alright, maybe I do know what I did, but it wasn't on purpose! It's not my fault it's so easy to start making a god!

Alright, this is going to be fine, I bet those new skills will keep me alive, please Mosquito God, I hope you gave me something good.

Pray level up. Charisma multiplier is now 1.03x

Alright! I'm being listened to!

Mosquito God 0.0000000006% to birth.

…SYSTEM! PLEASE SHOW ME MY JOB SKILL DESCRIPTIONS! Oh, and that new trait with a question mark in it.

Job Skills (Head Cultist of The Mosquito God):

Bloody Ritual(Lv 1):

Sacrifice blood to the Mosquito God in order to empower it. If pleased, the Mosquito God may give a boon.

Lead Prayer(Lv 1):

Lead a congregation in prayer to a higher being. Those praying provide 3%(Level of Pray • Level of Lead Prayer) more faith to the higher being. Those who witness a prayer led with this skill become 1.01% (Sqrt(Charisma)) easier to convince to embrace the higher being.

Current Target: Mosquito God(+)

Member Initiation:

Initiate a member into a religious order. Prayers to the primary higher being of the religious cult are 0.01%(Members/100) more effective.

Current Target: Cult of the Mosquito God

Messenger of the Mosquito God(Lv 1):

Can be used as a conduit for the Mosquito God in order to receive their wisdom. Can obtain passive help by the Mosquito God in dangerous situations.

Protection of Blood(Lv 1):

Use ambient blood as a shield to prevent damage. If no ambient blood is available, mana may be used to create some.

Cost of making blood: 100(100 / Level of Protection of Blood) mana per gallon.

Cost of Shield: 10 mana per gallon per minute.

Monster?(Legendary):

Requirements: Unlock the job system as a monster before tier 5.

Rewards increased based on the tier job system was unlocked at.

Tier 4 Increase intelligence multiplier by 1.1x.

Tier 3 Increase the leveling speed of job skills by 10%.

Tier 2 Open 1 additional job slot.

Tier 1 Job skills provide a 1.05 multiplier per level instead of 1.01.

Tier 0 Jobs require 50% Xp to level up.

That's… a lot of information. Alright, let's break this down. Bloody Ritual… will either get me killed from angering those stupid gods (Not you, Elly, please don't lower my life expectancy.) even more… or it could make me live longer by strengthening the Mosquito God… Whatever, I'll see how useful it is after I use it. Lead Prayer seems pretty useless as I would need someone to, you know, lead in prayer. I guess Member Initiation is supposed to help on that front. Messenger of the Mosquito God though… I'm pretty sure it activated Protection of Blood before I passed out in that storm… but it also forced me into this quest. It is a unique skill, which I thought were supposed to be made by my wishes but whatever?

Unique Skills can be made from the wishes of any being, not just the one they were granted to.

That explains nothing… Whatever, at least protection of blood looks useful, I had a mana stat now, right? Though that cost seems unmanageable, except I'm a mosquito… LUCKY! I got a skill that seems useless for anything not as small as me. Hahaha! Unless that's not a lot of mana. System, how much mana do I have?

Mana: 1/57

Yup. I am the best. Ha! Not to mention my new OP trait that just makes my jobs pretty much legendary, wait, my job is unique, nice. Now, why did Elly say (write?) something about choosing a name? I already have one! It's… Huh. I don't remember. System, what's my name?

No name available, would you like to choose one?

Ooo, I get to choose a name, I'll make it something awesome. Yes, I would. What are my options? Mosquito Overlord, Mosquito of Death, or maybe just Tim.

Name "Mosquito Overlord, Mosquito of Death, or maybe just Tim" chosen.

WAIT! NO! THAT'S NOT WHAT I MEANT! BRING ME BACK!

Trait Self-Named unlocked.

Trait Mocked by The Gods unlocked.

I hate you gods… except you Elly…

comments.comment_text: Thanks for the chapter! This is hilarious 😂

chapters.name: 9. Expansion
chapters.content:
Day 3

Well, I guess this isn’t all bad… I am at least immune to status effects, including the positive ones… WAIT! DOES THIS MEAN!?!?!

Slowly, I dipped my spears down into the blood, and took a sip. Seeing nothing bad happening, I continued.

Bloodsucker+1 activated. Human(Lv MIXED) blood(old) consumed. + 8 exp. 0.004% progress to human skill.

Status Poisoned(Minor) resisted.

Hahaha, HAHAHAHA! I CAN DRINK TO MY HEART'S CONTENT! HAHAHAHAHA! I HAVE CONQUERED THIS LAKE’S POISON! I SHALL BECOME OP AND DRINK IT ALL!

Bloodsucker+1 activated. Human(Lv MIXED) blood(old) consumed. + 8 exp. 0.006% progress to human skill.

Status Poisoned(Minor) resisted.

Level up!

+5 stat points

YES! SYSTEM! I WANT TO USE MY STAT POINTS!

Please select stats to put points into. (5 Available)

Strength: 0.1

Agility: 0.2

Dexterity: 0.1

Intelligence: 100

Constitution: 0.1

Charisma: 1

Alright, what are my options? I could up my health some more, which would help me survive these upcoming disasters that were being promised (Thanks Elly). But if I up my agility I could run away… could I? How much agility would I need to run away from a tornado? Actually, it doesn’t matter. I couldn’t survive a tornado either way. So… what else matters to me? More than anything else… Isn’t it obvious? I STILL HAVEN’T FOUND A MATE! THAT IS ALL I HAVE WANTED FOR THE PAST 3 DAYS!

Okay, maybe not the only thing… I may have also wanted to figure out a better way to live past 10 days… but bah! It’ll be fine! I just need more agility so I can fly faster. Then I can find out where they all went! They couldn’t have all died to those birds… or that god sent storm… ALRIGHT! All my points go into agility!

You might be reading a stolen copy. Visit Royal Road for the authentic version.

Processing Request…

Agility: 5.2

ERROR! Attribute Point cannot increase a stat by more than 10% of its base value.

Compensating…

Agility: 0.3

Wait a second… I used all of my points on agility… and it increased by 50%, that makes sense. But… won’t that mean I’ll get more for the next 5 points? Or if I had used them one at a time… FUCK THAT! SERIOUSLY!?!?! WHY DO I NEED TO THINK ABOUT MATH NOW! THIS WAS SUPPOSED TO BE A RELAXING REINCARNATION!

Alright, calm down… I can do it right next time, I can’t be that far from a level, right? System, what’s my level?

Level: 3/5

…System how much Xp do I have?

Experience: 1/20

Alright, just 3 more drinks. Let’s do this… It isn’t working… I’m full, aren’t I? COME ON! THAT’S NOT FAIR! WHY DO MY LEVELS NEED TO BE STOPPED BECAUSE I HAVE A LIMITED STOMACH!?!?!?! It’s fine, I’ll just do this later… later, yes! Hahaha. I am fine! Instead, I shall go find a mate!

And so! I continued my journey towards… sun up? Or was it sun down… Let’s go sun up! Sun up is most definitely the way to go!

And so! I set off on my journey again! AND! 10 minutes later! I FINALLY FOUND SOMETHING! A MOSQUITO! A lone mosquito, sure, but that’s fine! This will do just fine! Except… what’s that? IS that… a male!?!?! I DON’T EVEN KNOW HOW I CAN TELL?!?! It’s fine… It’s fine… This means I must be getting close… Onwards! Towards a mate!

I started flying past my newfound mosquito, only to be stopped. I felt a little tugging. Not a physical tugging, more like one on my mind. And it really wanted me to stay near that mosquito. Ignoring it, I continued forward! Toward the mosquito!?!?! Didn’t I just fly past it? It’s fine! GO! …Why is it in front of me again?!?!?!

Quest: Expand the Cult

Are you kidding me? Seriously? HOW!?!?! Wait, I remember! Member Initiation! Alright, how do I do this? Come on Member Initiation… Let’s make this quick. So, I need to… what? I need to DO WHAT!?!? HOW AM I SUPPOSED TO SUBMERGE HIM IN BLOOD!?!?! I DON’T HAVE HANDS! Wait! I know! I’ve got Protection of Blood! Alright! Protection of Blood!

I activated the skill and felt something slowly trickle out of me. It kind of tickled. It was like a finger was being caressed up my back., but a really small finger, and not my back, but my insides.

So, flowing out of me, I watched a red mist start to form around me, slowly condensing into a solid sphere. And, I was surrounded in a sphere of blood. Which did not help in the slightest. I NEEDED THE OTHER MOSQUITO TO BE SURROUNDED!

Alright, let’s try this again. I deactivated the skill, watching the blood fall back down into the pool below me. This time, I flew right up next to the mosquito, who did not seem to appreciate it. But whatever, it’ll be quick! I reactivated Protection of Blood, feeling that nice trickle again, and it surrounded both of us. SO, I let it go again, before my new friend got mad, and I think it worked?

I can feel some kind of connection to him, but it’s weird, maybe because he’s a mosquito?

Forcefully Converted Unnamed Level 0 Mosquito to Cult

Quest: Expand the Cult(1/5)

Haha! Now I can leave!

comments.comment_text:
WOOOOOOO FORCEFUL CONVERSION

THIS CANT POSSIBLY GO WRONG
All hail out hero, Mosquito Overlord, Mosquito Of Death, or maybe just Tim. May the cult grow ever stronger.

chapters.name: 10. Disasters
chapters.content:
Day 3

So, I tried to leave my new mosquito friend behind, but it wouldn’t leave me alone! It was following me! I guess that’s what it means to lead a cult. Such responsibilities. Wait a second… perhaps… Mosquito friend? Can you lead me to a mate?

My little friend seemed to understand me, and it started moving! Off to the mates we flew! And flew! And flew… AND, a solid hour later! I got a nice little welcome surprise.

Fly level up. Dexterity multiplier is now 1.05x.

Hahaha! It’s been a while since that happened! But where are those mates I’ve been promised? At that, my mosquito friend finally stopped. Below us was what appeared to be a red, bamboo raft on its side. There were cylinders sticking up from the water, all attached to each other who knows how? And it was huge. It spread all around me, probably able to fit 100 of me easily. And I knew what they were. Eggs! WHICH MEANS MATES! Probably… bah, hopefully.

So, I found my camp for the day. It was starting to get late. I mean, not really, but I was tired. I really had no stamina. So, first, a prayer.

Thank you almighty Mosquito God for keeping me alive and safe. I hope you are born safely and with enough power to keep me alive for longer than 10 days. And with that, I went back to bed for the

Second (third? Does passing out count?) time since my new life began.

Day 4

Life expectancy decreased to 7 days.

Age increased to 3 days.

Quest Don't Insult Elly, Goddess of Chaos, Pretty Much the Only God that can Mess with the Status of Reincarnators: + 5 xp

I woke up to the water churning around me. Another storm!?!?! I looked skyward, and whew, safe for now. Looking around, I saw that those eggs were thrashing about, violently. Very violently. And then they started bulging, Which I do not think is natural. Right? I’m no mosquito biologist, but that seems weird. And then, it stopped. And they exploded. EXPLODED! WHAT THE HELL!?!?! THAT IS DEFINITELY NOT RIGHT!

Bright red mosquitoes flew out from them, and started rushing towards me.

NEW QUEST AVAILABLE!!

Lead the Disaster Mosquitoes!

Success:

Kill at least 100 creatures with the Disaster Mosquitoes

Failure:

Kill less than 100 creatures with the Disaster Mosquitoes

Reward(s):

10% resistance to damage from disasters.

Penalty for Failure:

-10 Xp

Accept Quest(Y/N)?

The mosquitoes flew right past me, on their way to who knows where. Looking at that sweet reward… and that tiny little one drink penalty… YES! I WANT IT!

This story has been taken without authorization. Report any sightings.

I chased after my mosquito brethren. And we set off on a journey of carnage. Well… a journey, just maybe without any carnage. We flew for a solid 2 hours. I got another level in fly; I assume they all got a specialty, I did by then, and then they just stopped.

What happened next was a horror show, and I only have one thing to say about it. I no longer want to find a mate. With that completed, we continued on our journey. And, an hour of mind numbing flying later, something appeared off in the distance, something I had never seen before in my life (my mosquito life). DIRT! I mean, it was a pretty dark red, but DIRT! I was finally free from the lake of blood! Oh merciful Mosquito God, thank you.

Pray level up. Charisma multiplier is now 1.04x

Please choose level 5 specialization for Pray.

Can I do this later? I have a band of ravenous mosquitoes to look after.

If a specialization is not chosen within 24 hours, one will be chosen automatically.

The rarest one?

The specialization chosen will be randomized.

Fuck. Alright, I bet I can do this while flying. System, what are my options?

Pray(Lv5):

It’s the Thought that Counts:

Requirements - Pray(Lv5)

Prayers that are not responded to level the class 2x faster.

Empowered Prayer:

Requirements - Pray(Lv5), Have a religious class that targets a god

Prayers to your god are 2x clearer to them and seem more convincing.

Growing Prayers:

Requirements - Pray(Lv5), Pray is targeted to a god that is not yet born

Prayers to unborn gods are 5x more effective at making them grow.

Encompassing Prayers:

Requirements - Pray(Lv5), Have a religious class targeted towards leading

If a temporary boon is given thanks to a prayer, it will be given to all allies within 100ft too.

Who Needs the Gods?:

Requirements - Pray(Lv5), Have the Blasphemy trait at Major or higher

It is 5%(Level of Pray) harder for gods to interfere with you, but also 10%(Level of Pray • 2) easier for other higher beings to interfere with you.

They Answered!:

Requirements - Pray(Lv5), Have a prayer answered

When prayers are answered the results are 3x better

Only My God Matters!:

Requirements - Pray(lv5), Have the Blasphemy trait, Have a religious class that targets a god, Have the Mocked by The Gods trait

Locks all religious skill targets to current god (Mosquito God). All religious skills level 2x quicker and are 4x more effective. Against members of other religions, all skills are 3x more effective.

Is this even a question…? GIVE ME THE LEGENDARY ONE!

Mosquito God 0.000000001% to birth.

comments.comment_text: Instantly bad book, the mc is mosquito. I have a burning rage to all mosquitos!

replies.comment_text: Im’a write a book about a mosquito slayer now!
Perhaps the mc will change your mind. :) We'll have you loving mosquitoes sooner or later.
No! They must be purged!
No! They must be purged!

Edit suggestions:

But warehousewhere are those mates I’ve been promised?

This was an amusing typo :P

chapters.name: Interlude: The Church of Illinois
chapters.content:
The Goddess of Chaos, REDACTED, is most commonly known by just her title. This is because members of her church only refer to her, affectionately, as Elly around others. It is unknown why, but her name is a very closely guarded secret. When people outside of the church manage to learn it, holy quests by all gods are given to destroy them.

—Sir Elias the Second, Head of the Church of Illinois

It was starting out to be a peaceful day. The sun was shining, and the gardens were thriving. The ants had just made a new hill, the grasshoppers found food, and the new enchantments on the scarecrows were doing their jobs.

That was never a good sign. Florida, God of the Weather, was never in a mood this good unless one of the other gods were upset, and usually a big one.

I got out of my nightwear and into my official robes. They were a piece of lime green silk that trailed behind me as I walked. The image of a praying mantis was stitched into the back, and along the arms, making it seem alive as I walked.

An hour later, I was called for a meeting with one of the cardinals, Cardinal Beer Belly, as was his unofficial title (I have heard rumors it was put on his status, though.). Soon, I was standing in front of two large, oaken doors. A mural was carved into it, so lifelike it felt like it would reach out and touch me.

This story originates from a different website. Ensure the author gets the support they deserve by reading it there.

It was of a praying mantis, the same majestic creature that was on my back, eating a prey much larger than itself. It was sitting on top of a mountain of mice, with the largest of them in its grasp.

The mice around it were all killed brutally. Some had their heads lopped off; while others’ eyes had bite marks in them, blood oozing and spraying out.

A grim seem like usual, as battles involving insects normally are. People don’t realize it, but battles with insects can be the bloodiest of all.

I knocked on the door thrice, as was tradition, and got called inside.

I walked in to a large man sitting at a desk. He looked decent, middle-aged, a scraggly beard, and a bit of a belly on him. Behind him were rows of beers, ordered by their price, which probably helped him with that last trait. Cardinal Jared, head of this section of the Lyre Empire.

“Hunter Circle, I have a new job for you,” and right to business, as usual. “There is a new heretic that popped up near the Red Massacre. Supposedly he has a Mocked by The Gods trait, so I expect this one will be easy for you.”

Ah yes, my Illinois’s Dog job will come in handy for this one.

“Supposedly they’re trying to birth a new god, crazy bastard.”

Oh? Perhaps someone from another church will come along too.

“Don’t expect any backup though, Elly is apparently putting some pressure on the others for this one, so they are refraining from interfering.”

Well, at least this will be interesting.

chapters.name: 11. Swarm
chapters.content:
Oh wait fuck, I’m losing them! They started flying faster after leaving the blood, personally, I think it should’ve been the other way around though. What kind of mosquitoes get faster away from the presence of blood?!?! That is most definitely not right! Whatever! Off to the unknown! We flew past what I would generously call a wasteland. It was barren of all signs of life. We passed nothing but dirt and rocks, and dirt and rocks, and MORE DIRT AND ROCKS! I WANNA GO BACK TO THE POOL OF BLOOD! At least there I had something to eat! How bad would it be to lose this quest? System, how much xp do I have?

Experience: 6/20

Would going into negative xp be bad? It’s not like they can take back my levels. Actually… after everything that happened they probably could… ALRIGHT! OFF TO THE UNKNOWN!!! We flew for a while longer, AND WE CAME UP TO SOMETHING! Something that does not look nice, in fact it looks pretty bad…

We came across a bright red boar. I mean, it looked just like any other boar, fur, hooves, those weird tusks. Except it was bright red… and huge! That thing was the size of a large hill! I couldn’t even see over it! WHAT IS WRONG WITH THIS WORLD!?!?!

Oh wait… I’M A MOSQUITO! I… really hope this world doesn’t have elephants. Oh wait, oh no, please don’t!

The Mosquitos had the bright idea to attack it! THE HILL SIZED BOAR!

The mosquitos all landed on it, and started sucking. Now, I imagine 100 mosquitos on my must be rather annoying, and I think the board agreed. It started thrashing and kicking all around it. I watched in horror as it started crushing the mosquitos on it, one by one, until it… stopped? Wait what!?!?

IT STOPPED!?!?!

Quest: Lead the Disaster Mosquitoes!(1/100)

What the hell? THEY KILLED IT!?!?! HOW?!?! NO! THAT’S NOT FAIR! HOW IN THE!?!?! I COULD NEVER KILL IT WITH 100 OF ME! WHAT ARE THE STATS ON THESE THINGS!?!?! I CALL CHEATS! LET ME BE A DIFFERENT MOSQUITO! I DEMAND A REDO!!!!!!!!

Unauthorized use of content: if you find this story on Amazon, report the violation.

Oh wait, they’re off again! NO WAIT, WE’RE OFF AGAIN!

And this happened again, with another 2 boars, really driving home how much the world hates me, making me a regular mosquito. Stupid world.

And then they came. They flew in like a storm high on cocaine. They were everywhere, hopping along the ground, flying through the air, I’m pretty sure I even saw a few come out from the ground. It was a swarm, of locusts. They came crashing through like a plague, and got utterly massacred by my fellow mosquitos.

It was like watching ants try to survive a hurricane, and that’s putting it lightly. The mosquitos blurred from my vision as they attacked, each spearing at least 3 locusts a second. The battle was over almost before it even had a chance to begin. In a few seconds there were thousands of locusts lying dead on the ground, I think I finally understood why they were called disaster mosquitos.

Quest “Lead the Disaster Mosquitoes!” Completed

Reward(s):

10% resistance to damage from disasters.

And so, I left my mosquito friends to go do their own thing, as I had something much more important to do. I had locusts to eat! I went up to the first of what I assumed would be many bodies, and got to work sucking.

Bloodsucker+1 activated. Locust(Lv 1) blood(fresh) consumed. + 1 exp. 10% progress to locust skill.

And, 9 mosquitos and 9 more xp later! I finally did it!

Bloodsucker+1 activated, Locust Skill Swarm Tactics unlocked

Bloodsucker+1 level up. Constitution multiplier is now 1.01x.

Haha, my first group battle that I totally participated in! And it comes with a handy dandy rewards! System! Show me what Swarm Tactics does!

Swarm Tactics:

Increases constitution multiplier by .01(Members of Swarm / 100).

I have a swarm member…? And sure enough, from the distance, my cult member came flying in at a leisurely pace.

comments.comment_text:
Edit suggestions:

The mosquitos blurred from my vision as they attacked, each spearing at least 3 m locusquitos a second.

chapters.name: 12. Status Catchup
chapters.content:
Day 4

Well then, now what? I guess I could look over the things on my status. I think I skipped over a few traits. System, show me my status, please.

Name: Mosquito Overlord, Mosquito of Death, or maybe just Tim

Gender: Male

Level: 3/5

Experience: 16/20

Age: 3 days

Expected Lifespan: 7 days

Race: Mosquito(Tier 0)

Stats:

Health: 1.52/ 1.52

Mana: 47/47

Strength: 0.1

Agility: 0.3

Dexterity: 0.106

Intelligence: 110

Constitution: 0.102

Charisma: 1.04

Skills:

Aerial Combat(Lv 1)

Bloodsucker+1(Lv 2)

Fly(Lv 7)

(Lv 5)Holy Flight

Pray(Lv 5)

(Lv 5)Only My God Matters!

Swarm Tactics(Lv 1)

Class Skills:

Bloody Ritual(Lv 1)

Lead Prayer(Lv 1)

Member Initiation

Messenger of the Mosquito God(Lv 1)

Protection of Blood(Lv 1)

Traits:

Love this story? Find the genuine version on the author's preferred platform and support their work!

Blanket Of Enemies

Blasphemy(Major)

Blood Born

Mocked by The Gods

Monster?(Legendary)

Self-Named

Super Fertile

Alright, so what haven’t I seen before? I think I forgot to check Aerial Combat, so let’s start with that. System! Show me Aerial Combat!

Aerial Combat(Lv 1):

Gives the user knowledge on how to fight while midair.

Alright cool, that means literally nothing. At all. It gives me knowledge?!?! HOW AM I SUPPOSED TO QUANTIFY THAT!?!?! Alright, it’s fine (not really). I bet the Fly makes more sense, System, show me what Fly does.

Fly(Lv 5):

Gives users with wings knowledge on how to use them.

Lv 5 Holy Flight:

Requirements - Fly(Lv5), Pray(Lv 3), Pray skill targeted at a god that can fly

Increases the amount of thrust generated by wings. Pray skill is 5%(Level of Fly) stronger. Wings are imbued with holy energy and become 3%(Level of Pray) sharper and harder.

Alright fuck you too. Seriously?!?! I get the holy flight, but more knowledge!?!?! WHAT DOES IT MEAN!?!?! GIVE ME NUMBERS! THEY ACTUALLY MAKE MORE SENSE THAN WORDS FOR ONCE! GRRRRRRRR! It’s fiiiiine (really not really)! I still have one more! SYSTEM! PLEASE (and you better make it good) SHOW ME… Super… Fertile…

Super Fertile

Requirements - Born with less than 30 days to live.

10x more fertile.

Am… AM I BEING MOCKED FOR MY SHORT LIFESPAN!?!?! THAT IS A LOW BLOW! NO! NOT FAIR! I HAD FINALLY (kinda) GOTTEN OVER IT! ALRIGHT! WHO DID THIS?!?! I WILL FIGHT YOU! Alright, alright, calm down, it’s okay. There is nothing I can do about this. Wooo. Calm. Like a… rock. Yes, calm like a rock.

Skill Like a Rock obtained.

That’s a skill? Okay? That’s cool… probably… Hopefully… System, what does Like a Rock do?

Like a Rock:

Take on the properties of a rock.

So… I complain about bad skill descriptions… and I GET THIS?!?!?! I am totally being made fun of here, aren’t I? Haha Elly, really funny.

Wasn’t me - Elly ;)

Alright, I will shelf this for now. Back to business. What was I doing oh? Oh yeah, checking my skills. I’m done with that. What’s next? Finding a meal? I could go back to the bloody lake… Yeah fuck that. Even if I starve I am never going back. Ever. That place is way too boring… and the only thing to drink is… doesn’t matter! Oh wait, I haven’t checked Mocked by the Gods or Self-Named yet. Alright, let’s make this a two for one. SYSTEM! Show me Mocked by the Gods and Self-Named, please.

Mocked by The Gods:

Requirements - Have something about you mocked by at least 10 Gods.

All beings with holy jobs at a higher level than the owner of this trait (Lv 1) can see what the gods are mocking them for (Name).

Self-Named:

Requirements: Pick your name yourself.

10% harder to be forced into a soul contract without your consent.

I’m sorry… how many gods are mocking my name!?!?! WHAT DO YOU MEAN AT LEAST 10! DO THEY NOT HAVE ANYTHING BETTER TO DO !?!?!?! YOU GODS SUCK! ALL OF YOU! GO DIE IN A HOLE!

Quest “Don't Insult Elly, Goddess of Chaos, Pretty Much the Only God that can Mess with the Status of Reincarnators” failed.

Life Expectancy - 5 days

...I'm sorry?

comments.comment_text: I've been meaning to ask this, but why is he not drinking from the lake to get to lvl 5 as soon as possible.

replies.comment_text: He has a limited stomach capacity.

chapters.name: 13. System
chapters.content:
Day 4

I… I didn’t mean it… Elly…? Please!?!?! I WANT MY DAYS BACK!!!!!! ELLLLLYYYYY!!!!!!!!!!!!!! I’m… no… my days… System, what’s my life expectancy…?

Expected Lifespan: 2 days

I-I… okay. I can deal with this! I just need to up my life expectancy, right? Yeah, that’ll work just fine. I’ll just eat a turtle or something. They live long, I bet they have a skill for that, right? RIGHT?!?! NOW WHERE DO I FIND A TURTLE!?!?! WAIT! GETTING STRONGER MAKES PEOPLE LIVE LONGER, RIGHT?!?! Wait no, that depends on the genre. But maybe?!?! Alright, I bet I can eat some more locusts, yes, I can do that.

Bloodsucker+1 activated. Locust(Lv 1) blood(fresh) consumed. + 1 exp. 5% progress to locust skill.

HEY!?!?! IT WENT UP BY 10% LAST TIME! THIS IS NOT FAIR! WHY IS IT WEAKER NOW?!?!THIS WAS NOT IN THE DESCRIPTION! I DEMAND RECOMPENSE!

Description of Bloodsucker+1 updated.

SYSTEM! SHOW ME THE DESCRIPTION OF BLOODSUCKER!

Bloodsucker+1:

Gain experience from consuming the blood of creatures, and when enough blood of a single species has been consumed, gain a random skill from their species. Each subsequent skill gained from the species requires more blood.

+1 Can store 10x more blood. Blood is digested 30x faster.

At least it isn’t for everything… WHAT AM I KIDDING?!?! FIX THIS! I DEMAND MY SKILL BE MADE BETTER! SYSTEM! I WAS LIED TO! FIX THIS!!

Processing Request…

Due to uncovering a previously unknown aspect of skill Bloodsucker+1 rewards will be granted.

Rewards:

10 xp

2 levels in Bloodsucker+1

Trait Skill Researcher

Level up!

+5 stat points

Bloodsucker+1 level up. Constitution multiplier is now 1.03x.

Bloodsucker+1 level up. Constitution multiplier is now 1.04x.

Trait Skill Researcher unlocked

Who said complaining never gets you anything? Clearly it does! Thanks, system. Now, to abuse you. Let me level up!

Unauthorized use of content: if you find this story on Amazon, report the violation.

Levels can only be obtained by gaining experience.

…haaaa. System, I want to use my stat points.

Please select stats to put points into. (5 Available)

Strength: 0.1

Agility: 0.3

Dexterity: 0.1

Intelligence: 100

Constitution: 0.1

Charisma: 1

Alright, I know what I need to do. System! Put 1 point into agility!

Please select stats to put points into. (4 Available)

Strength: 0.1

Dexterity: 0.1

Intelligence: 100

Constitution: 0.1

Charisma: 1

That will be all, thanks.

WARNING! If available stat points are not added, they will be removed! Confirm Action?

WAIT WHAT NO?!?! I DO NOT CONFIRM!

Please select stats to put points into. (4 Available)

Strength: 0.1

Agility: 1.3

Dexterity: 0.1

Intelligence: 100

Constitution: 0.1

Charisma: 1

Wooo. I guess I won’t be abusing you quite yet, system, put another 4 points into agility, please.

Processing Request…

Agility: 5.3

ERROR! Attribute Point cannot increase a stat by more than 10% of its base value.

Compensating…

Agility: 0.45

I feel like you should add something so I don’t get an error message whenever I try to level up! This is getting annoying! Alright, let’s get down to business! What does Skill Researcher do?

Skill Researcher:

Requirements - Show the system something new about a skill, Have an overseer assigned for your system

50% easier to obtain skills.

I don’t like that. I don’t like that AT ALL! SYSTEM! WHAT’S AN OVERSEER!?!?!

Processing Request…

Information Redacted

Oh fuck you! NO! I DON’T WANT AN OVERSEER! I WANT MY PRIVACY! STOP WATCHING ME! GO AWAY! THIS IS AGAINST MY HUMAN RIGHTS!!! Except I’m not a human… do animals have rights…? You know what, as an animal, I say we do!

Processing Request…

WARNING! Upon removing the overseer, access to the system will be revoked.

You know, I like my overseer. Yup. They’re a great guy (gal?). They’ve been so nice to me. It would be a waste to make them leave over a tiny issue like privacy. Who needs privacy anyways? Yeah privacy’s for losers. I prefer my lack of privacy; it makes me cool.

NEW QUEST AVAILABLE!!

Change your Overseer to Elly, Goddess of Chaos!

Success:

Request a change of your overseer to Elly, Goddess of Chaos

Failure:

Do not change your overseer before death.

Reward(s):

Have the magnificent Goddess of Chaos as your overseer.

5 Xp.

Penalty for Failure (Or not Accepting):

Elly’s Wrath

Accept Quest(Y/N)?

…I think I’m gonna accept that quest… Because Elly is the best. My favorite Goddess, yup, that’s why. And system? I would like to request a change of my overseer. Can you make it Elly?

Processing Request…

Request Accepted! Overseer changed to Elly, Goddess of Chaos.

Quest “Change your Overseer to Elly, Goddess of Chaos!” completed!

Reward(s)

Have the magnificent Goddess of Chaos as your overseer.

5 Xp.

Cool, awesome. I am going to have a great… What’s my current life expectancy?

Expected Lifespan: 2 days

These are going to be a great 2 days… I can feel it.

chapters.name: 14. Blood
chapters.content:
The term overseers is a strange one. There are mentions of it in a few historical texts, and it is occasionally said to be uttered by the mad. Not much is known about it, as the records found appear to contradict each other greatly. Some describe them as benevolent angels that help to make people stronger, while others say they are mischievous devils, hampering growth or trying to collapse nations whenever possible. All that is certain is that the people who mention them were all people of great power.

-Unknown Historian, Three days before death

Day 4

I decided the best course of action was to finish my meal, and then deal with my impending doom…

Bloodsucker+1 activated. Locust(Lv 1) blood(fresh) consumed. + 1 exp. 20% progress to locust skill.

And three mosquitoes later I was done. System, how much experience do I have?

Experience: 15/25

So… there’s only one way I’m gonna get that last level isn’t there… But I really don’t want to… I was finally on dry land… I’m gonna have to go back to the sea, aren’t I? This is not fair! I wanna see the world! You know what, I can’t even guarantee I will be able to live longer if I do level up. I’m gonna go exploring!

A method to increase life expectancy may appear at level 5 -Overseer Elly

…Should I be thankful for that information? Alright. So I have two options. I can either trust the cryptic message by the goddess that has done pretty much nothing but threaten and harm me… Or I could go and explore and have some fun… but if I don’t increase my life expectancy… and I die… my soul will be given to Illinois… Huh. THAT’S NOT FAIR! I WANT TO HAVE FUN! NOT SIT AROUND SOME STUPID BLOOD LAKE! GRRRRRRRRRR! WHY CAN’T SOMETHING GO MY WAY FOR ONCE!?!?!

A case of literary theft: this tale is not rightfully on Amazon; if you see it, report the violation.

ALRIGHT! BACK TO THAT STUPID LAKE WITH NOTHING TO DO BUT WAIT AND SLEEP! Except… where is it? I kind of wasn’t paying attention… Hmmm. Alright! I shall go the opposite of the way the mosquitoes left! That makes sense! Yes! I shall go… sun down?

YES! SUN DOWN! OFF INTO THE UNKNOWN… Wait, the known, I've been there before! I CAN’T EVEN SAY THE LINE NOW! C’MON! Wait, I couldn’t say it before, only think it…

Off into the known…

Twenty minutes later and I came to a harrowing conclusion. I was definitely lost. I was pretty certain I had seen this football shaped rock at least three times, and how many football shaped rocks can there be, right? So… What next? Clearly my sun based navigation did not work. Perhaps I can smell it? Didn’t Blood Born do something like that? System, what does Blood Born do?

Blood Born:

Requirements - Born in a pool of blood.

Increases attunement to blood by 10%. Highlights nearby sources of blood.

Maybe it will be highlighted? System! Activate Blood Born!

Blood Born activated

Alright, so I looked around, only to see absolutely nothing was highlighted. Of course it isn’t! Why would there be an easy source of xp nearby? Yup. So, I decided there was clearly only one course of action. More loop de loop practice! So I started my loop and— WHAT THE HELL IS THAT!?!?!?! IT’S SO BRIGHT! OH GOD! TURN IT OFF! PLEASE! FOR THE LOVE OF GOD!

Blood Born deactivated

What? Aren’t those… clouds?!?!?! WHY ARE THE CLOUDS FULL OF BLOOD!?!?! WHAT IS WRONG WITH THIS WORLD!?!?! FIRST A LAKE OF BLOOD AND NOW SOME CLOUDS!?!?! I SWEAR! THIS MAKES NO SENSE! HOW DOES BLOOD GET INTO THE CLOUDS!?!?! HAS NOBODY THOUGHT ABOUT HOW EVAPORATION WORKS?!?! IT CAN’T EVEN CARRY SALT!

chapters.name: 15. Clouds
chapters.content:
Curious things tend to happen in areas where massacres occur, and they can be very interesting. The most common occurrence, as most people would think, is the creation of a field of undead. If the bodies are not taken care of quickly, they will quickly attune the ambient mana to death and start to rise again. This phenomenon is also the easiest to deal with. The second most common occurrence would be what happens around the sites of Godly Interference, the lingering holy mana stops the undead from rising, but is also too strong to let any but the most pious live there for long without seriously suffering. The final occurrence which I am going to mention is a much more curious one. It tends to happen when people are killed for great rituals or too much of their blood seeps into the ground. It will help attune the ambient mana to the blood property, making entire ecosystems that thrive on blood instead of water.

-Excerpt from The Environmental Impacts of Mana, by Professor Lamia

Alright, I’ve gotten plenty of levels in fly, right? Maybe if I can fly up to the clouds I can drink the clouds! Alright, they can’t be that high, right? TO THE CLOUDS! And so, I started climbing. Up and up I went, getting way higher than I could before. Only to come nowhere near the height I needed to reach. At all. I mean, let me make a comparison. If my goal was to fly to the top of a tree, I probably just made it past the roots that aren’t quite in the ground for whatever reason. Alright, but I have an idea, and based on the the description I got from pray, it might just work. OH MAGNIFICENT AND GREAT MOSQUITO GOD! PLEASE GRACE ME WITH YOUR PRESENCE AND ALLOW ME TO FLY ALL THE WAY TO THE CLOUDS!

Pray level up. Charisma multiplier is now 1.05x

Mosquito God 0.0000000011% to birth.

Alright, but that doesn’t really he-

A huge gust of wind shot up at me from below and sent me tumbling through the air. Up I went, tossed around like a mosquito in the wind, literally. It was horrible. I was turning over and over, unable to control my ascent even slightly. I watched the ground disappear from beneath me over and over, as it went in and out of my view. Until I hit something. It was hard, moist, and oddly red. And completely stopped my momentum, mostly. I went through it first. Feeling gravity about to take its hold over me again, I did the most obvious thing. I flapped my wings, hard and fast, and in thirty seconds I was upright again! And right there below me was an inconspicuous looking cloud… and my cult member? WHAT THE HELL WAS HE DOING HERE!?!?! HUH!?!?! Oh, wait… I guess it was a strong gust of air, and he was right next to me… Alright! Journey with a friend! Perhaps we can eat clouds together!

This story originates from a different website. Ensure the author gets the support they deserve by reading it there.

So, I flew down to the cloud’s level, and went right into it. And there was a small problem. How do you eat damp air? I basically have a straw attached to me and that’s it. This is not very conducive to drinking… How does one eat a cloud? Hmmm…. What a conundrum… This was totally a waste of time, wasn’t it? I prayed to get sent flying up here, only to be unable to do a thing! IF I HAD A MOUTH AT LEAST I COULD TRY TO BITE IT!!!!! BUT I’M STUCK WITH THIS STUPID SPEAR? WHAT CAN I DO WITH IT?!?! STAB!?!?! HERE I’LL STAB!!! And, of course, I stabbed, a few times, then got a cool new skill.

Skill Spear Handling obtained.

Description of Spear Handling updated.

What? I just got that!?!?! System, what’s Spear Handling?

Spear Handling

Gives users knowledge on handling their big spears. ;)

…Ummm. Is that an emoticon…? Elly…? What did you do!?!?!

Overseers have the right to modify personal skill descriptions.

…ELLY!?!?! FIX IT! I WANT MY SKILL DESCRIPTIONS! THAT WAS MY LIFEBLOOD! THAT WAS THE ONE THING THAT WAS MOSTLY FINE! AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAHHHHHHHHHHHHHH! I SHOULD’VE JUST ACCEPTED YOUR WRATH! THIS IS NOT FAIR! SYSTEM! I WANT TO REQUEST A CHANGE OF OVERSEER!

Processing Request…

Overseer must be requested by name.

System, I would like to request a change of overseer to the Mosquito God…?

Processing Request…

Request Denied.

What do you mean denied!?!?! YOU CAN’T DENY ME! I DEMAND TO SEE YOUR MANAGER!

Processing Request…

Request Denied.

Denied? DENIED!?!?! I WILL BE THE ULTIMATE KAREN! THIS IS NOT THE LAST YOU WILL HEAR OF ME!

comments.comment_text:
Mosquitoes are annoying.

Karens are also annoying.

Iowa help those who meet both.

chapters.name: 16. Level 5
chapters.content:
Day 4

SYSTEM!?! How would someone go about filing a complaint?

Processing Request…

Request Denied.

Alright, alright. That’s fiiiine. THAT’S FINE! I have more options! Such as… OH ALMIGHTY MOSQUITO GOD! Please smite Elly for me, you can do that, right? Smite another god?

Skill Messenger of the Mosquito God Provides a new quest!!!

Compliment Elly

Give Elly, Goddess of Chaos, a compliment.

Failure:

Insult Elly, Goddess of Chaos.

Accept Quest(Y/N)

Not you too Mosquito God… WHAT DOES SHE HAVE ON YOU!?!?! ANSWER ME!?!?! MOSQUITO GOD!!! Oh, and I’ll accept this quest. Elly, you’re great at spreading chaos. In fact, you’re probably the best at it!

Quest “Compliment Elly” completed!

Reward(s)

10 Xp.

Level up!

+5 stat points

Max Level obtained! Evolution is now possible!

…I’m sorry what? Does that say evolution!?!?! HAHAHA! I WILL NOT HAVE TO BE A WEAK MOSQUITO ANYMORE! IS THIS THE OPPORTUNITY ELLY PROMISED!?!?! I AM ALIVE! I CAN LIVE! I DON’T HAVE TO DIE SO SOON! THANK YOU ELLY! I LOVE YOU! YOU REALLY ARE MY FAVORITE GODDESS!

ALRIGHT SYSTEM! I WANT TO EVOLVE!

WARNING! UNUSED ATTRIBUTE POINTS WILL BE REMOVED! Continue?

Uhh, no, just put them all into agility please, system.

Processing Request…

Agility: 5.45

ERROR! Attribute Point cannot increase a stat by more than 10% of its base value.

Compensating…

Agility: 0.675

ALRIGHT! NOW I WANT TO EVOLVE!

Processing Request…

Evolution Options:

Poison Mosquito(Tier 0):

Mosquitoes born in areas bathed in poisonous mana. Poison Mosquitoes are not very strong physically, but are mildly poisonous. Their poison gets stronger the longer they live, but it is generally considered only mild as their lifespan is not long.

Requirements - Be a mosquito, Willingly ingest poison

Expected Lifespan: 10 days

Max Level: 5

Stats:

Fly

Holy Mosquito(Tier 0):

A species of mosquito created by Illinois, God of Insects. Holy Mosquitoes are much longer lived than most other types, but relatively harmless. Their looks make people confuse them with fireflies, as they appear to consume darkness instead of blood, making them seem to glow.

Requirements - Be a mosquito, Have a holy job

Expected Lifespan: 1 year

Max Level: 5

Disaster Mosquito(Tier 0):

Mosquitoes born in areas where the fabric of the world is in chaos, or when a higher being wants to send a punishment. Disaster Mosquitoes are not that dangerous individually, being barely different from an ordinary mosquito. But as a group they are a force to be wary of. Disaster Mosquitoes can drink more blood when they are surrounded by others of their kind, and with a mere 10 they have the capacity to drain a full grown boar.

Requirements - Be a mosquito, Survive at least 2 disasters as a mosquito,

Expected Lifespan: 10 days

Max Level: 5

Mosquito(Tier 8):

The evolution of a basic mosquito. A mosquito evolving is an event rarer than an eclipse, and when they do they are rewarded with power to match, causing short lived but disastrous consequences.

Max Level: 40

Strength: 50000
