Species Paragon

That’s a lot of text… Let’s go through this one at a time. Alright, so poison mosquito… Got it. That feels like it will be OP if I can live longer than 10 days. It can’t be that hard. It took me what, 3 days to reach level 5? I can’t imagine how OP I would be after a year! Alright, so good option.

What’s next? Holy Mosquito? That sounds cool… They were made by Illinois? That might be a bad idea… I can’t imagine becoming something made by a God that hates me would be a good idea… but Consumer of the Void sounds awesome and it is a whole year of life… Let’s shelf that one for now.

Disaster Mosquito? Weren’t those what I was in a group with?!?! THEY WERE OP! Alright… I’m sorry. What is that description!?!?! THE FABRIC OF THE WORLD IS IN CHAOS?!?! Were those mosquitoes my fault!?!?! DID I UNLEASH A MOSQUITO DISASTER!?!?! WAIT! NOPE! IT WAS ELLY! Yeah! She’s the one that put that stupid status on me! Mhmm! Nothing to do with me! …Almost nothing! But ahem! Yeah! This sounds OP! I won’t even need to worry about finding more disaster mosquitoes if my mere presence makes them too! This’ll go on top of the list!

Alright! I think this is the last one! A TIER 8 MOSQUITO!?!?! AND WHAT ARE THESE STATS!?!? THEY’RE IN THE TENS OF THOUSANDS!!! I’M GOING. To.. be… OP…. That’s a 2 hour life expectancy… FUCK! I WANTED TO BE OP! Wait… maybe it’s worth it… 2 hours of being a god… Yeah who am I kidding? Of course it isn’t… I hate this stupid system! It just gives me something good then spits in my face! Every! Single! Time!

NEW EVOLUTION OPTION(S) UNLOCKED!

Karen Mosquito(Tier 0):

Mosquitoes born to annoy the gods. Karen Mosquitoes have the uncanny ability to speak to anyone’s manager, even if that manager resides on another plane. Their wings are formed in a shape that can cause a high pitched screeching when flapped in a specific way.

Requirements - Be a mosquito, Annoy Elly, Goddess of Chaos so much she makes a new species

Expected Lifespan: 10 days

Max Level: 5

Stats:

Strength: 10

Agility: 10

Dexterity: 10

Intelligence: 10

Constitution: 10

Charisma: 10

Skills:

Fly

Aura of Irritableness

Piercing Flight

Talk To the Manager

Traits:

Super Fertile

You know what? I did say I would be the ultimate Karen! Thank you, Elly. SYSTEM! MAKE ME A KAREN MOSQUITO!

WARNING! EVOLVING TO A NEW SPECIES WILL REMOVE ATTRIBUTE BONUSES FROM LEVELS! As compensation 10% of current base attributes will be permanently added to attributes.

…Whatever! I ACCEPT! EVOLVE ME!

chapters.name: 17. Crusade
chapters.content:
Monster evolution is a strange topic. Not much is known about it, as research into it was banned in most cities. What little is known is that monsters get stronger with every tier they go up, and the harder the work the stronger their evolutions. There have been reports of ancient cities falling in nights, due to the evolution of simple creatures like worms. Luckily, most the time when those kind of monsters are created, they never last long enough to destroy too much, so if you see one, run.

-The Bloody Axe, Day 1 of Adventurer Training

I felt myself be detached from my body as I accepted, one limb at a time. First my legs, then my wings, until finally it got to my head and I popped out. I was popped out with so much force that I felt like I was flung in a catapult. Forward into the unknown darkness. I flew for what felt like hours, no control over where I went. Until I felt it. Waves of power flew off of it. I could feel its desires radiating across me, setting my path in stone. Grow. Mate. Consume. PAIN.

I searched for the source of this new desire, looking frantically around the endless void. And I saw it. Hundreds of thousands of mosquito eggs. They glowed in void, the only hint of light for miles around. Except the very edge of it was being destroyed. The lights were slowly blinking out of existence, one at a time. I flew to the edge of the light, flying faster than ever before. Thousands of eggs flew past me as I went. At the edge, I saw it. There were insects, darker than the void. All around the eggs they were biting and scratching, destroying them, eating them. Out of pure instinct and rage, I started to flap my wings quicker. They sped up until they were faster than those of a hummingbird, until a high pitched scream came out. It pierced the void, causing the invaders to back up. Then something happened. All around me, the mosquito eggs hatched. Thousands upon thousands of disaster mosquitoes poured out, and launched themselves into the fray to protect the unborn eggs. And then I was gone.

I was back in my body, laying on the…ground? Wasn’t I in the air?

Mosquito God 0.5% to birth.

Fly level up. Dexterity multiplier is now 1.07x.

Trait Godly Caretaker unlocked.

Trait Holy Crusader unlocked.

ERROR! As a sapient creature, intelligence cannot go below 100.

Compensating…

Intelligence + 90

What just happened?

System! Show me my status!

Due to being 100% compatible with body, Bloodsucker+1 has been upgraded.

Unauthorized duplication: this narrative has been taken without consent. Report sightings.

Name: Mosquito Overlord, Mosquito of Death, or maybe just Tim

Gender: Male

Level: 0/5

Experience: 0/5

Age: 3 days

Fly(Lv 8)

(Lv 5)Holy Flight

Like a Rock(Lv 1)

(Lv 5)Only My God Matters!

Spear Handling(Lv 1)

Aerial Combat(Lv 1)

Alright, everything seems normal… those are some high stats… aren’t they? Hahaha. HAHAHAHA! I CAN DO IT NOW! I CAN DO IT! ALRIGHT SYSTEM! I WANT TO TALK TO YOUR MANAGER!

Talk To the Manager level up. Charisma multiplier is now 1.06x.
…It didn’t do anything? System, what does Talk To the Manager do?

Talk to the Manager:
People will feel compelled to grab their manager when you request it from them. Chance of success is based upon how much charisma each person has.

…How much charisma does a system have? Wait. Does it count as a person? Uhhh, Elly? Does the system count as a person? Elly? Please?!?! I NEED TO KNOW! I MADE A PROMISE! TO BE A KAREN! C’MON! LET ME DO THIS! CURSE YOU ELLY! CURSE YOU SYSTEM MANAGER THAT WON’T SPEAK TO ME! SYSTEM! I WANT TO TALK TO YOUR MANAGER!

Requesting Supervisor…

Yes..?

chapters.name: 18. Supervisor
chapters.content:
Is the System intelligent? That’s a question many scholars throughout the years have pondered upon. I, for one, believe it is. There are many instances where its intelligence can be seen. The creation of new skills, especially unique ones, updating skill descriptions, and when people level up. In all of these cases, the System needs to do stuff that instinct alone could not allow. No creature can just instinctually create things from nothing but a wish, Djinn notwithstanding.

-An excerpt from ‘Peculiarities of the System’ by Doctor Reed

Supervisor Obtained!

All around me, everything froze. There were no of the usual sounds you would expect in a barren wasteland. No howling winds, buzzing of my mosquito pal’s wings… not a lot happens here, does it? Either way, everything stopped. I couldn’t even feel my wings beating anymore. Suddenly, a huge pressure descended upon my mind. I felt a mass of anger pushing me aside in my own head. It felt like I was being crushed between an unbreakable wall and a constantly expanding balloon. Until I was just a small speck of dust being squeezed to the limit inside my own head.

Hello Mr… Mosquito Overlord, Mosquito of Death, or maybe just Tim, what can I help you with today?

In an instant the massive pressure upon my mind lifted, replaced with… elevator music? How does anger turn into elevator music!?!?!

I apologize for this, but I am on a schedule, what would seem to be the problem?

Oh… Can I get a new Overseer? Mine fucking sucks. She ruined my skill descriptions!

Let me see what happened… Ah I see, Extremely Lovely Lard of Yellow, yes, she can be a problem. I am sorry though, it appears she has not broken any rules or regulations so there is nothing else I can do about that. Did you need anything else?

The author's narrative has been misappropriated; report any instances of this story on Amazon.

No?

Before I go, I must tell you that you’ll get a survey after this, if you opt to take it a reward will be given. Alright, I hope you have a nice day, Mr. Mosquito Overlord, Mosquito of Death, or maybe just Tim.

…What the hell just happened? Did I just meet with a customer service person!?!? WHO THE HELL WAS THAT?!?!

NEW QUEST AVAILABLE!!

5 Minute Survey

Success:

Take a short survey about your the help recieved.

Failure:

Do not take survey

Reward(s):

3 levels in Like a Rock

Accept Quest(Y/N)?

…Yes? I’ll take a survey.

Thank you for agreeing to take a short survey. Please rate your experience on a scale of 1 - 5 Stars in each of the categories.

Problem Solving

Customer Service

Attitude of Supervisor

Uhh… 1 star in problem solving and 5 in the other two?

Quest “5 Minute Survey” completed!

Reward(s)

3 levels in Like a Rock

Like a Rock level up. Constitution multiplier is now 1.05x.

Like a Rock level up. Constitution multiplier is now 1.06x.

Like a Rock level up. Constitution multiplier is now 1.07x.

Yay…? Wait, seriously, what just happened!?!?! I’M IN A FANTASY WORLD! With gods and magic mosquitoes! WHY DID I JUST TAKE A SURVEY!?!?! THIS IS TOTALLY BROKE MY IMMERSION! WAIT! FUCK! THIS IS REALITY! THERE’S NO IMMERSION TO BREAK!

chapters.name: 19. Names
chapters.content:
…What just happened? Really? I am so confused. Alright, let’s break it down. I think my new skill worked, and a supervisor was received… Who was really just some customer service representative, and they said my Overseer was Extre-

NEW QUEST AVAILABLE!!

Never Repeat that Name

Success:

Never repeat the name about to be thought about.

Failure:

Repeat THAT name.

Reward(s):

Possibly Live for a while

Penalty for Failure (Or not Accepting):

Start of a Holy Crusade

Accept Quest(Y/N)?

Messenger of the Mosquito God activated. Quest accepted.

She really has something on you, doesn’t she? I thought so before but this all but confirms it!

Messenger of the Mosquito God level up. Charisma multiplier is now 1.07x

MOSQUITO GOD! ANSWER ME! WHAT DOES SHE HAVE!?!?! I’ll find out eventually! And when I do I’ll… hmmm. What would I do? Even if I know I can’t stop you from using that skill… I’LL FIGURE IT OUT LATER! BUT I PROMISE I’LL DO SOMETHING! Hmmm… is it safe to assume the holy crusade is against me?

Yes.

…Alright. No repeating Elly’s name! Though I would like to say, it is an EXTREMELY LOVELY NAME! Hehehe. I wonder how gods are named… Mosquito God seems to have been named after my prayers, maybe that’s how? But then who would pray to… to Elly? Whatever, people are weird! Now! Moving on… I should probably check out my new skills… I only got two, right? Oh wait, three. Alright System! What does Aura of Irritableness and Piercing Flight do?

The tale has been stolen; if detected on Amazon, report the violation.

Aura of Irritableness:
Release an aura 0.36m (Charisma / 30) around the user that makes people who work at shops more irritable.

Piercing Flight:

Gives user knowledge on how to flap their wings in a way that emits a piercing ring that has a chance to intimidate foes with a soul.

I feel like those are way less useful than they originally sounded… That aura is so specific… and I don’t think I’ve seen a shop since I was reborn… Not to mention how I CAN’T BUY ANYTHING ANYWAYS! I CAN’T TALK! I. CAN’T. TALK! I KNEW I SHOULDN’T HAVE TRUSTED ELLY! SHE WAS JUST GETTING A NEW CHANCE TO MAKE FUN OF ME! But I couldn’t just not take it… it was unique…

Species Karen Mosquito(Tier 0) rarity updated!

Skill Talk to the Manager rarity updated!

I JUST COMPLIMENTED THE RARITY! AND YOU GO AND DROP IT!?!?! DO YOU NOT LOVE ME!?!? AM I NOT LOVABLE ENOUGH FOR YOU!?!?! WHY DO YOU HAVE TO RUIN THE GOOD THINGS!?!?! Hey System… can I be compensated for this…?

Processing Request…

Alright, I believe! PLEASE MOSQUITO GOD! HELP ME WITH MY REQUEST!

Request Denied.

…Alright, that’s fine. I never really wanted it anyways (really). Yup, never, I don’t care in the slightest. Now! I am ready to move on! Like a rock, I have no qualms! So, my mosquito friend! Do you happen to know the way back to the blood pool? I kinda need more cult members. I wanna complete that quest… SO! Where are we going? Mosquito friend? Mosquito friend wasn’t going anywhere… Are you lost too? Fuck. I really hoped you were better with directions… it’s kinda hard to remember which way to go when you get ripped out of your body and then an almighty customer service representative forces its way into your mind. You know? I’m pretty sure most people would be lost after that (I definitely wasn’t lost before it. Not at all!). SO! I think it is fine… Now which way should I go…?

Let’s go sun up! Because you always start the day with the sun going up? I think that makes sense. It’s good luck! Because the mornings are the best part of the day! Yeah that’s a lie. That is definitely a lie. Alright! Sun down! Because at night you finally get to go to bed! And! Off into the distance we go!

chapters.name: 20. Plants
chapters.content:
Four hours and one night later… WE FOUND IT! Not the blood pool, BUT PLANTS! BONAFIDE RED PLANTS! Alright, the color is a little weird, but PLANTS! Who needs the blood pool? I’VE GOT PLANTS! Bloody red plants, but whatever! And… something here smells really good. It smells delicious in fact, what is it? Mosquito friend? Where are you going?

Status Hypnosis(Minor) resisted.

Wait what? What just happened? MOSQUITO FRIEND? WHERE ARE YOU GOING!?!?! My friend was zooming right by me towards a weird looking plant. It had two massive flaps, connected by a thin line of white between them. On the edges there were hundreds of long, thin strands of plant. It was a grotesque creature, like nothing I’d ever seen before… IT WAS A VENUS FLY TRAP! WAIT! MOSQUITO FRIEND!

My mosquito friend started to slow down, but it was too late. He flew right into its mouth, and it shut closed in an instant…

Swarm Tactics level up. Constitution multiplier is now 1.07x

Quest: Expand the Cult(0/5)

…My only friend… he… he was my only friend! MOSQUITO FRIIIIEEEEEND! I- I can’t do this! He was the only one I had! I- I NEED HIM BACK! PLEASE MOSQUITO GOD! I’LL DO ANYTHING! JUST BRING MOSQUITO FRIEND BACK! PLEASE! I‘M BEGGING YOU! I HAVE NOTHING ELSE! Even if he couldn’t speak and think… He was still my only friend! I need him back! Please! PLEASE!

I landed on the ground and mentally sobbed the day away, and the next. I no longer wanted to do anything. At all. I stared at the plant that murdered my friend, and came to a conclusion. In a bloody forest, it probably has blood too. So, I started my plot for vengeance! I took my spear, and stabbed that stupid plant! And I sucked its blood! HAHAHAHA! TAKE THAT!

Bloodsucker+2 activated. Human(Lv MIXED) blood(old) consumed. + 4 exp. 0.008% progress to human skill.

Status Poisoned(Minor) resisted.

Human? Not plant monster!?!?! WHAT IS THIS!?!?! Oh wait… plants don’t have blood… SO I’LL HAVE TO CUT IT DOWN! What cutting materials do I have…? Wait! I remember, didn’t holy flight do something? System! Show me the description of Holy Flight!

Lv 5 Holy Flight:

You might be reading a pirated copy. Look for the official release to support the author.

Requirements -  Fly(Lv5), Pray(Lv 3), Pray skill targeted at a god that can fly

Increases the amount of thrust generated by wings. Pray skill is 8%(Level of Fly) stronger. Wings are imbued with holy energy and become 6%(Level of Pray) sharper and harder.

Alright that’s fucking useless. What difference does it make if my wings are harder when they start so weak anyways!?!?! Alr-

Suddenly, I felt Messenger of the Mosquito God activate again, and my bloody shield popped up in an instant. Right afterwards, I could feel myself being flung far away into the distance. I was squished up against the side of my shield as I flew at breakneck speeds (Do I have a neck?). My shield splattered against a plant. THAT HURT! WHAT THE HELL WAS THAT!?!? AND SYSTEM, WHAT’S MY HEALTH?

Health: 50/157

OH HELL NO! I turned around, trying to see what almost caused my untimely demise, and it was something I had not seen in a long time. A human! A bonafide, living human! With a very large sword that definitely did not match the rest of his outfit. He was wearing a robe decorated with images of all kinds of insects battling against each other. They were all over his outfit, the largest of them being a grand praying mantis, in the middle of decapitating a mouse. He locked his eyes on me, and I saw him smirk, as if he was making fun of me for a joke I hadn’t heard. I can’t believe him! He tried to kill me! Right after we met! I didn’t even do anything! And of course, when facing something that was probably 200x bigger than me,  did what everyone else would have done! I used my Piercing Flight and booked it!

I saw the man stumble for a second presumably from that soul piercing sound I can emit. Heh, maybe not completely useless. Except he started chasing me in less than a minute. Because why would my skill be any good!?!?! As he caught up, I reactivated my Protection of blood, except I did something wrong and it started to envelope both of us! But before I could even do anything to stop it, it stopped itself and started raining… I ran out of MANA! I FUCKING RAN OUT OF MANA! I FINALLY USE IT IN A FIGHT AND DON’T EVEN HAVE ENOUGH!

Forcefully Converted UNKNOWN NAME Level 20 Human to Cult

Quest: Expand the Cult(1/5)

…We both stopped dead in our tracks, and I could feel the pure rage of this man coursing through our bond. It was way stronger than any feeling I ever got from my mosquito, but not quite as much as the customer service representative…

“WHAT THE HELL DID YOU DO TO ME?!?!?!”

…HE CAN SPEAK TO ME! WAIT! WHAT IS THIS!?!?! Am I… finally not alone?

“ILLINOIS HAS ABANDONED ME YOU STUPID BUG! EXPLAIN YOURSELF!”

“SHUT UP AND LET ME THINK! I CAN FINALLY SPEAK TO SOMEONE!”

Oops. That may be a bad first impression…

chapters.name: Interlude: Elly’s Domain
chapters.content:
There are many arguments on who the strongest god is, and if gods even are the strongest beings. Some people argue that their strength is based on their followers, as it is well known that praying to gods can empower them, while others argue it depends upon their title, as some titles hold much more weight than others. I think it is a bit of both. Take the Goddess of the Sun as an example. She has a very small following, but whenever she starts a holy crusade, all the other gods turn the other way. The sun is what gave life to all without mana, and is therefore very important to both history and the present.

—Sir Elias the Second, Head of the Church of Illinois

“PFFFFFT, YOU LOST HIM TO A BUG! HAHAHAHA!” Elly cackled at Illinois, watching the projection in front of them. She was absolutely thrilled at what was happening. It showed a mosquito flying next to a man in a full robe, which was losing its images by the second. Both parties were utterly drenched in blood, and the man was positively fuming.

Next to Elly sat a mantis, Illinois, enraptured in the projection. Illinois appeared just as mad as the man on the screen, except he actually had smoke wafting off of him, he truly understood the meaning of fuming.

Love what you're reading? Discover and support the author on the platform they originally published on.

“Elly! Enough of this nonsense! That stupid bug is going to cause all of us problems and you know it! It always causes waves when reincarnators make gods, and never good ones!”
“Oh you worry too much, I’ve got it handled. Just enjoy the show! This mosquito is about to do something good, I can tell!”

“ELLY! DON’T YOU REMEMBER WHAT HAPPENED LAST TIME A GOD WAS MADE!?! WE WERE AT WAR FOR DECADES!”

“I said I have it handled, understand?” The projection disappeared, and it was replaced with a new image. It was a great storm wafting across lands, changing everything in its path into pure gold. People, animals, plants, buildings, nothing was spared.

“Al-alright! I understand! You’ve got it handled.” Illinois stopped fuming and seemed to turn blue as he stopped pushing. “I just hope you don’t make the same mistake as last time.” On that note, Illinois disappeared from sight, presumably off to gather some support.

“I swear, you cause no disasters for a few centuries and they all forget why they listen to you. Kids." Elly turned the projection back on to what it was originally and sat down to have a look at it. But the screen was empty, no mosquito or person to be found.

“Ugh, now I have to find them again, I swear, Illinois is such a baby.”

chapters.name: 21. Mr. Newest Cult Member
chapters.content:
So… I met a person, finally, and they tried to kill me… And then better yet, I forcefully converted them into a cult, even though it sounds like they had some relation with Illinois. And my mosquito friend died. Yup everything’s looking up, everything's just wonderful!!

“I’m going to kill you. Once I’m free from whatever you did, I’m going to kill you!”

Yup, everything's going great! You know what, I know what I need to do!

“Hello Mr. Newest Cult Member, my name is Tim, who are you?”
“I. Am. GOING. TO. KILL YOU!”

“Sheesh, what is wrong with you!?!? Do you not know how to say anything else!?!?”

“I’m going to murder you.”

“Alright, something else, that's good. So, anything else to say?”

“After I kill you I’ll murder your god too.”

“HEY! RESPECT YOUR GOD!”

At that statement, I could feel Mr. Newest cult Member squirming, clearly struggling with something inside of him.

He started speaking (Is it speaking if it’s in your mind?) again, this time I could feel him actively resisting his own words though, weird. “Of course I respect… What’s their name?”

Stolen from its original source, this story is not meant to be on Amazon; report any sightings.

“Ah yes, have you finally come to respect the almighty Mosquito God, who helped me triumph over you and the flimsy Illinois?”

“Yes. I- I- I have the utmost respect for the almighty Mosquito God.”

At those words, Mr. New Cult member passed out sweating profusely. I stared at him for a solid thirty seconds, before deciding it was time to sleep too.

And I woke up alone… WITHOUT MY CULT MEMBER! HE WAS FUCKING GONE! I searched around desperately, hoping for some sign of where he went, but the only thing there was the aftermath from yesterday's… battle. Yup, battle. It was a mighty battle. Where every participant's life was on the line.

WAIT! HE DIDN’T DIE? DID HE!?!?! SYSTEM! HOW ARE MY QUESTS?

Quest: Expand the Cult(1/5)

Quest: Never Repeat that Name

Alright, good, still alive. But why would he run…? What am I kidding? He seemed furious at me… but not attacking? Hmmm… maybe… I never tried this before. System, what does Head Cultist of the Mosquito God do?
Head Cultist of the Mosquito God:

The leader of the entire Cult of the Mosquito God. Has absolute power over other cult members, as long as the Mosquito God wills it. This class can only be removed by death or the Mosquito God personally removing it.

Oh. Oh no… I definitely mind controlled my new member a little, didn’t I? Ahem. Well, it was an accident! I’m sure he’ll understand! Yes! I just need to see him and we can sort everything else. But where could he have gone…?

Maybe he went back wherever he came from? I think he yelled something about Illinois abandoning him. Oh, he was definitely here to kill me, wasn’t he? Is Illinois still mad at me for Mosquito God taking some of his jurisdiction? I feel like sending a person after me is way too much! I am a mosquito for god’s sake! A MOSQUITO! I LITERALLY CAN’T DO ANYTHING BUT FLY AROUND AND SUCK SOME PEOPLE'S BLOOD! Oh, and apparently forcefully convert people into followers, but that’s it! Oh, and survive a strike from a giant sword… But that’s it? That is it, right? Oh, I can make mosquito eggs birth disaster mosquitoes. BUT OTHER THAN THAT! I am nothing but a normal, harmless mosquito… I’m definitely a problem.

comments.comment_text: TFTC, also is it REALLY mind control if they say they LIKE the mind control? (while under mind control but that's not the point.)

chapters.name: 22. Travel?
chapters.content:
Putting my matter aside… I think I know how to find him! We’ve got that mental link from him totally willfully joining the cult! I bet I can use it to feel him out! Alright! Here goes nothing! I can definitely feel it… It feels like a small strand of thought that’s been anchored int my brain. Maybe if I touch it (Touch feels like a weird word since it’s just in my head.)… OW! OW! OW! OW!

What the hell was that!?!?! Touching it felt like when you touch a lightswitch that isn’t properly insulated. But about 5x worse. I’ll admit, not that bad, but still. Sheesh, that was weird. Alright! Next option! If I can’t touch it, maybe I can follow it? Alright, so it goes… in? Wait no, out. No, it… I can definitely tell where it goes. But, I’m ninety percent certain the direction doesn’t exist. It’s like when a 2d object moves in a third dimension, from its perspective, everything it can see changes for every miniscule movement it makes. IT MAKES NO SENSE! Though… I do think I can go that direction… I mean, worth a shot.

So, I tried to move… in but out..? And everything BROKE. I MEAN IT BROKE! I was sent spiraling through space that really just did not exist. I felt like I could see every part of me at once. From my wings, to my blood sac down to my very molecules themselves. Then I could see… my soul? The very essence of my being. It was red. Blood red, and in constant turmoil, I could see it decaying at an actually visible pace, and it was worrying.

Then, I could see his. My cult member. His soul was the same color as my own, but it was quickly being tainted a vibrant green. Then next came his molecules, then his organs, until finally I saw him, and landed right in front of his face only to be immediately slammed into as he just kept on going with whatever he was doing before.

Skill Space? obtained.

“...Hello my cult member! How are you?”

At that, he stopped dead in his tracks and turned around. He stared at me incredulously for a solid ten seconds, and then he just stopped looking at me and moved on.

“HEY! You can’t just ignore me!” I shouted at him through our beautiful space breaking mental link. Which he also ignored… “I WILL SUCK YOUR BLOOD IF YOU DON’T LISTEN TO ME…! Alright, here I come!”

I flew closer to him, intent on sucking a little bit of blood from him, it’s not like he needed it all anyways, and he dodged! He freaking dodged! As I neared him, he suddenly jerked forward, keeping me away.

“Hey! Don’t do that! Stop right there and let me suck your blood!”

At those words, I could see him start to slow down, not stop mind you, but whatever. Close enough. I went to suck his blood again, of course. And he jerked forward as I neared! He dodged again! I swear, people! He just doesn’t listen!

Support the author by searching for the original publication of this novel.

“I SAID! Stop and let me suck your blood!”

This time he stopped. Heh, can’t ignore me forever. So! I flew right up on his face, and I speared him! And, honestly, he tasted sooo much better than everyone that stupid pool. Not that he tasted good… I would never say that human blood tastes good. Of course. Because it doesn’t. It’s just that he tasted better.

Bloodsucker+2 activated. Human(Lv 20) blood(fresh) consumed. + 10 exp. 0.01% progress to human skill.

Level up!

+5 attribute points

Wait a second… System! Show me my status!

Name: Mosquito Overlord, Mosquito of Death, or maybe just Tim

Gender: Male

Level: 1/5

Experience: 9/10

Age: 7 days

Expected Lifespan: 7 days

Race: Karen Mosquito(Tier 0)

Stats:

Health: 157/ 157

Mana: 73/73

Strength: 10.01

Agility: 10.0675

Dexterity: 10.71

Intelligence: 120

Constitution: 10.71

Charisma: 10.8

Skills(+)

Class Skills(+)

Traits(+)

Oh cool, they shortened it. Thanks Elly, it was getting kinda long.

No prob, 👍

Oh no… SHE FIGURED OUT ACTUAL EMOJIS! WHO TOLD HER!?!?! Whatever, doesn’t matter! Like a rock! Yes! Like a rock! What was I doing? Oh yeah! Finally, it has happened! I can get full credit for my stat points! HAHAHAH! Now, for the moment of truth. System! I want to level up!

Please select stats to put points into. (5 Available)

Strength: 10

Agility: 10

Dexterity: 10

Intelligence: 100

Constitution: 10

Charisma: 10

And now! As we’ve been doing, put them all in agility!

Processing Request…

Agility: 15

Hahaha! HAHAHAHAHA! FINALLY! YOU CAN NO LONGER SKIMP MY STAT POINTS OFF OF ME! I CAN FINALLY BECOME OP! MWAHAHAHAHA! So of course, with my new found agility, I did the most important thing ever. I finally had enough speed for it. I DID A FLIP! A FLIP! MWAHAHAHAHA! NOBODY CAN STOP ME NOW! I CAN BECOME THE BEST PART OF ANY SHOW! THE ONE THAT DOES THE TRICKS! Those elephants that do tricks have nothing on me! What’s a giant elephant when you compare it to a graceful mosquito? Nothing! That’s what!

And now, back to the important stuff. Not that it’s really that much more important than doing a flip but whatever. Ever since I finally got him to stop, Mr. Cult Member has just been standing there.

“So! I think you forgot about me when you got up this morning, not that I blame you, but you really shouldn’t be like that. You can’t just run off! Got it…? Hellooooo? Did you forget how to speak to me? C’mon?”

At that statement, I see what looks like grim determination in my cult member’s eyes. And the- OW OW OW! WHAT THE HELL WAS THAT!?!?! IT felt like something got ripped from my mind. It was like when someone pulls off a scab, except the scab was actually a piece of flesh!

Quest: Expand the Cult(0/5)

Wait what?

chapters.name: 23. Bloodsucker+2
chapters.content:
Alright! It’s fine! I just need to convert him again! Right!?!? Alright, I got this! Mr. New- Soon to be a new cult member rushed me with his sword! I tried to dodge to the side as he ran up, but he swung it like a bat! A bat! A SWORD IS NOT A BAT! Though it was effective…

I was hit through the air at probably my new top speed, straight into the air. I flew up through the trees, until I hit a branch. And was squished. Completely and utterly squished. It all happened in an instant. I was whole, and then a pile of bug guts. There was a searing pain all over, as I felt my life winking out of existence. It… it was a good week. At least I got a chance at another life…

Bloodsucker+2 activated. -14xp, health healed to full.

Level -1. Attributes reduced by 10% until level restored.

I could feel my body knit itself back together, sapping out the very essence of my being. As my eyes reformed, I saw Mr. Soon to be Cult Member walking away, very clearly thinking I was dead. So! I did the smart thing for once, and just sat there, waiting for him to disappear. As he walked away in silence, carrying his sword, I had a realization. What the hell did Bloodsucker just do? Hey System, can I see bloodsucker’s description?

Bloodsucker+2):

Gain experience from consuming the blood of creatures, and when enough blood of a single species has been consumed, gain a random skill from their species. Each subsequent skill gained from the species requires more blood.

The tale has been illicitly lifted; should you spot it on Amazon, report the violation.

+1 Can store 10x more blood. Blood is digested 30x faster.

+2 Consumed blood can be used to restore self upon taking damage, at the cost of experience.

Wait! When did it become +2? Huh? I don’t remember that! But that is awesome! I am immortal now!. Wait… Oh no! System! What’s my life expectancy?

Life Expectancy: 7 days

Oh nevermind, I’m fine. I’ve got plenty of time. I just need four… Nope, I leveled down, make that 5 levels. That’s really easy though. I did that just fine before! Alright! I am on easy mode! As long as I don't get squashed again. I don’t really have any more experience I can convert to health… That’s fine! I can just drink more plants! Heh, living around a ton of blood may not be as bad as it seemed. As long as I have food, I am immortal! MWAHAHAHAHAH! Now! To restore my stock of food! Alright, there’s a… venus flytrap over there I can eat. A FUCKING FLY TRAP! I hope they all die! Wait, calm down, like a rock… LIKE A ROCK! I can get past this, I’m not racist. Just because one flytrap killed my friend… my only Friend. Doesn’t Mean They’re Bad! Nope I can’t do this. I will admit it! I want to exterminate those stupid plants! They deserve death in all of its forms! I WILL BURN THEM ALL TO THE GROUND WITH A FIRE HOTTER THAN THE MOON. OH ALMIGHTY MOSQUITO GOD, PLEASE HELP ME WITH THIS WISH OF MINE! I WILL PRAY TO YOU EVERY NIGHT UNTIL MY GOAL IS COMPLETE, JUST HELP ME OUT HERE!

Head Cultist of The Mosquito God level up. All stats +2.

YES! THAT IS PERMISSION WE SHALL BURN THE VENUS FLYTRAPS TO THE GROUND!

comments.comment_text: Hey, just found this story, enjoying the ride so far. Keep it up! 🐸

chapters.name: 24. Forest?
chapters.content:
Alright, how do I burn a venus flytrap with what I have…? Perhaps my new skill? System? What does Space do?
Space?:

Travel through dimensions by following paths connected to the user. (Skill does not allow creation of paths).

Oh come on! You bring my hopes up by promising dimensional travel, but then crush them into a paste! What kind of skill lets you travel through dimensions, but only if the paths are already open? That makes no sense! This is so unfair! This is like if a spear skill only worked if you had a spear… Wait, no… uhhh. YES! A MAGIC SKILL ONLY WORKING IF YOU HAD MANA! No wait, that’s not it! I’ll figure it out! Just give me a bit! I can do it eventually. More importantly! To kill those flytraps!

Yes! They must be perished, it was practically a holy mission. They killed our first cult member, a crime that cannot go unpunished!

SO! OPTIONS! Hmmmm… Drinking them did not work before… Can I even set things on fire with what I have? Alright! We will shelf this until we get more cultists with arms! First thing’s first though. TIME TO DRINK! At least I can get them back a little…

Bloodsucker+2 activated. Human(Lv MIXED) blood(old) consumed. + 4 exp. 0.01% progress to human skill.

Bloodsucker+2 activated. Human(Lv MIXED) blood(old) consumed. + 4 exp. 0.012% progress to human skill.

Level up! Attributes restored!

Bloodsucker+2 activated. Human(Lv MIXED) blood(old) consumed. + 4 exp. 0.014% progress to human skill.

Alright! Well, I should probably get some cult members and finally finish my quest. I’d rather not have the threat of Illinois having my soul keep hanging over my head. But where can I find more members?

Looking around, there was honestly a surprising lack of animals for a forest. I think I could see some kind of bird flying through the air every now and then, but I think I’d rather not mess with them… Birds are terrifying. Unless… can I convert their eggs? Hmmm… I mean, I don’t see why not. TIME TO FIND A BIRD NEST!

This book was originally published on Royal Road. Check it out there for the real experience.

I flew up to the trees, searching for a bird nest? Wait? Would they be made of sticks? This place seems a bit weird. Now that I’m looking around, it makes no sense at all! The trees look like they’re just regular old oak or something (Except they’re red). But on the ground, there were tropical plants. I mean, those plants with huge leaves and some venus flytraps. How does that work? Whoever made this forest definitely messed up.

Who puts such different types of plants together!?!?! I’m no… botanist? Are they just for flowers or plants in general? I think plants in general. Either way! I’m no plant biologist, but I think there’s a reason different plants grow in different places. Don’t they have different growing requirements?

Fantasy worlds make no sense.They can’t even grow plants right! Wait! No! Don’t get distracted! I was looking for bird nests! So! Let’s just assume they make their nests out of wood. If they don’t I’m never gonna find them anyways. Alright, what’s up here? I flew around for a bit, finding no signs of any nests. As I flew, looking around I not-

I’M TRAPPED! HELP! I was struggling around trying to figure out what got me. I couldn’t see anything at all to keep me here. Nothing was holding me! Then all of a sudden, I started shaking. I upped my struggling even more. But it was futile. Nothing could get me out of my predicament. I was dead again, not a few hours after my second cultist decided to try and kill me.

As the shaking increased, I saw it. The cause of my certain doom. There were thousands of eyes all around me, slowly inching closer as they realized I was trapped. Attached to those eyes were hairy bodies that had eight dastardly legs coming out. THEY WERE SPIDERS! NOT SPIDERS! OH MY GOD! THEY ARE SO MUCH MORE TERRIFYING UP CLOSE AND GIANT!

I increased my struggling as much as I could, but it was to no avail, I wasn’t getting out. Ideas! Ideas! There’s gotta be something else I can do! This can’t be how I go out! Not to spiders! With their hairy legs and soulless eyes, staring me down as they inject their poison into me.

WAIT! I’VE GOT IT! I activated Protection of Blood, making it spread out all around me, then let it fall, praying this would work.

Forcefully Converted Spider*216 to Cult

Quest “Expand the Cult” Completed

Reward(s):

1 level in Head Cultist of the Mosquito God job.

Head Cultist of The Mosquito God level up. All stats +2.

Head Cultist of The Mosquito God level up. All stats +2.

Head Cultist of The Mosquito God level up. All stats +2.

Haaa!

chapters.name: 25. Spider Cultists
chapters.content:
Mosquito God 0.51% to birth.

So… spiders are absolutely terrifying. Especially when they are bigger than you are… GOD! I HATE THIS! SPIDERS! LET ME OUT OF HERE!

At that, the spiders resumed their advance towards me. Slowly getting closer, hopefully not to murder me. As they reached me, they started eating the air around me. When they finished, I gracefully plopped to the ground. Yes, graceful as a potato being launched out of a cannon. Mhmm. The literal perfect picture of grace.

Well then, on the ground I wiggled a little, getting the last of what I assume was threads that were binding me off, and flew up to my… newest cultists.

There were hundreds of spiders just sitting on the webs, 216 to be exact. And they were just sitting there silently, staring at me. I could feel the bonds I held with each of the individual spiders, and they all shared the same desire. They were hungry, starving. There wasn’t enough food for them here, and eventually they would start turning on each other.

So, I guess I have two options. Leave these horrifying monstrosities to defend for themselves and hope everything goes well, or try to feed them. You know what? That first option seems mighty appetizing. Yes, survival of the fittest and all that, I think they’ll be fine. So! Off into the unknown!

Skill Messenger of the Mosquito God Provides a new quest!!!

Protect the Cult

Success:

Keep the Cult of The Mosquito God alive for at least 20 days.

Failure:

The Cult of The Mosquito God shrinks to less than 5 members within 20 days.

If you come across this story on Amazon, it's taken without permission from the author. Report it.

Penalty for failure:

Soul will be given to the higher being with the most grudges against you.

Current Target: Illinois, God of Insects(+)

Accept Quest(Y/N)

YOU’RE NOT EVEN OFFERING REWARDS THIS TIME! WHAT IS THIS? At least last time you promised a carrot with the stick! Now it’s just a stick! That is not how you are supposed to get people to do things!

Messenger of the Mosquito God activated. Quest accepted.

And of course no choice. You’re getting worse, Mosquito God, you know that? I bet it’s Elly’s influence, isn’t it? You know, you should probably distance yourself from her a bit, if this is what she’s teaching you. Try another god, one more charming! Like… Illi- nope nevermind. I guess Elly works for now. I’ll find you a better option eventually, though. Just you wait! I will find you a good mentor!

Now then… how to feed 200 spiders? That, my friends, is a conundrum. Is there even a way to feed 200 spiders in this place? I think I’m the only bug around, and there isn’t much else.

Alright spiders! What do you normally eat? At my question, my head was swarmed with pictures of… other spiders. Alright, yikes, this is gonna be a problem. Cannibalistic spiders, that’s great. Especially when I need them to stay alive. Ugh. Do you guys eat anything else?

At that, I only get images from a few of them. There are some images of various bugs that climb around on the trees. Alright, that’s a start! Let’s check on that!

At that thought, I flew a little higher up into the trees, and was met with a sight I never expected to see. There were some bugs on the branches higher up, and the higher I went, the more there were. A few branches above the spiders, they were sparse, just a bug here and there. A few branches above that, there were definitely more, I could see bugs every inch or so, way more than there should be on a tree. Then, as I flew up, it got worse. There were bugs everywhere. There was not an inch of free bench space on the tree, I can’t believe I didn’t see it earlier. All over were various kinds of bugs, beetles, worms, caterpillars, all fighting each other for food. There were beetles swarming over caterpillars and worms, ripping them apart as fast as they could. While the worms and caterpillars did their best to defend and eat the leaves.

And some of them were doing oddly well. A few caterpillars were surrounded in bodies of beetles, instead of living ones. Looking closely, it appeared that whenever they touched those caterpillars, the beetles just dropped dead, no warning. It was war down there. And it looked like the perfect place to feed my new cult. Because what is better than a pile of dead bugs to feed all of those spiders? The answer? Pretty sure it’s nothing.

comments.comment_text: How da hell the spiders not look up

chapters.name: 26. Hunting Methods
chapters.content:
Of the adventurers that live past their first week of monster encounters, the highest cause of death among them is people. When fighting criminals, most of you are going to freeze up. Fighting an intelligent person isn’t the same as fighting monsters. People just can’t handle going for the killing blows, especially when fighting people that are being controlled, such as some cultists. SOo,you need to decide before you take on a quest hunting people if you are ready to kill them. As once you start fighting, it’s either you or them.

-The Bloody Axe, Day 15 of Adventurer Training

I flew back down to the siders, ready to deliver my commands upon them, but they were gone. Nowhere to be seen! They disappeared! I flew around a little, searching for them. And I got caught again. I swear, these threads are actually invisible, I can’t see them! But, lo and behold! The spider cultists reappeared and let me out. At least they’re learning. Alright! Spiders! I have found food! It is time for us to climb!

At that statement, I felt massive resistance from every single spider there. Not a single one seemed like they were willing to climb higher, being afraid of something. Alright, c’mon what’s wrong with you stupid spiders? There’s food right above you! We just need to go get it! At that statement, the spiders started sending me new images. And they were not pretty.

It was a scene of hundreds of thousands of insects crawling all over a massive spider that spanned the length of the tree. They were biting and tearing it, opening tiny wounds they would then manage to crawl into. And then the spider collapsed, consumed by the hoard of ravenous insects.

Ah, I see. You know what? Maybe we can find another source of food. Yeah, let’s leave those bugs alone, they seem like good people, wouldn’t want to harm them for no reason. It wouldn’t make sense. Mhmm. So, where else can I get unlimited food for spiders? I wonder…

This story has been taken without authorization. Report any sightings.

Spiders? Can you make spiders strong enough to catch… birds? At that question, I saw some ardent refusal. Gah, birds and their stupid spider eating abilities. I’ll get them eventually. Alright! Wait! Do I even need to feed the spiders…? I mean, I could just convert some insects instead… Hmmm… Yeah no. I can’t abandon these guys, can I? I mean, as terrifying as they are, if you look past their hairiness and way too many legs, their eyes are kinda cute. Kinda like puppy dog eyes. Yeah, let’s go with that. They’re cute! And you can’t just abandon cute things, it’s a crime against nature. Against the very forces of the universe itself!

Alright, I’m going about this wrong, this is a fantasy world! I bet the fantasy spiders are weird too! So! Spiders! How would you normally get food? At that I was sent two very different images, each coming from a different half of the group. One half just showed normal spider things. Making webs and waiting for the insects to be caught in them.

And the other half showed- WHAT THE HELL IS THAT!?!?!?! OH GOD THAT IS NOT RIGHT! I THOUGHT THESE WERE SPIDERS! DIDN’T THE SYSTEM SAY I CONVERTED SPIDERS?

System notifications may be changed within the bounds of the user's perception.

What? I have literally no idea what that means. But anyways. The other half. It started off weird, as I expected with them being fantasy spiders and all. So, it started with them swarming a boar, climbing all over it. The boar, of course, tried to get them off, shaking. And then they… Okay, so that place where the webs normally come out of a spider. It opened up, I mean, like opened up from three sections, each with pointy rows of teeth. And then they reformed into a stinger. A scorpion stinger. And they all stung the boar, all at once. The boar went from thrashing about to dissolving right at that instant. It went from a thriving boar to a puddle of goo within an instant. And the spiders just lapped up the mess.

chapters.name: 27. Rocky Rock
chapters.content:
Alright. So. Scary, sorry, cute, spiders can hunt. Then why don’t they hunt? SPiders? Why don’t you hunt? At that question, I finally got no answer. Great. They didn’t think to hunt. Seriously, I can’t believe their first thought when they are hungry is cannibalism. Alright spiders! Let’s go hunt! Time to find some food! I started flying off into the distance, but they didn’t follow. Spiders? Instead of following, the spiders decided to expand their webs. Spiders? I said it’s time to hunt!

Spiders? SPIDERS! C’MON! SPIDERS! LET’S GO HUNT! Aright, alright. This is not working. No matter what I say, they won’t stop expanding that stupid web. Ugh. It’s fine! I’ll calm down. Like a rock. Be a rock.

Like a Rock level up. Constitution multiplier is now 3.24x.

Please choose level 5 specialization for Like a Rock.

Wait what!?!?! Why is my multiplier so high!?!? What happened here? System!?!? Can I have some help?
Processing request…

Request Granted!

Constitution multiplier breakdown:

Base: 1

Like a Rock: 0.04

Swarm Tactics: 2.17

Bloodsucker(+2): 0.03

Wait a minute… Are my cultists part of my swarm? Hahaha. HAHAHAHAHA! I AM INVINCIBLE! I thought Bloodsucker made me invincible, but with this. I am truly invincible. I’ve probably got so much health nobody can believe it. System, how much health do I have?

Health: 494/494

Oh yeah! Even if I die, I’ll come back with so much health you won’t be able to do anything! Two lives! Oh wait. More importantly! I have a specialization to choose! System! Let me see my options!

Like a Rock(Lv5):

This narrative has been unlawfully taken from Royal Road. If you see it on Amazon, please report it.

Rocky Thinker:

Requirements - Like a Rock(Lv5)

Think like a rock.

Rocky Patience:

Requirements - Like a Rock(Lv5)

Wait like a rock.

Rocky Acting:

Requirements - Like a Rock(Lv5)

Play dead like a rock.

…What the hell is that? Seriously? This makes no sense. Then again… so does the skill. Alright. So what do I want? Thinking like a rock sounds like a bad idea. I don’t know what that does but I think I’d rather not have to worry about my brain turning off. Rocky patience could be good. I’d say rocks are pretty patient, and patience doesn’t hurt anyone. Or I could play dead. Playing dead seems pretty good, right? Rocks aren’t alive so I’d imagine they can play dead pretty well. Alright! Let’s learn to play dead, in case Mr. Ex Cultist comes back. I’d rather he thinks I’m dead. Alright System, give me Rocky Acting!

Specialization Rocky Acting chosen.

Woah. I just got some really weird information in my head. I think I can… turn my skin into stone? Can I be a statue? Wait, this is so cool. I gotta try this. So, I followed the instructions implanted in my head by this new specialization. I released some magic around the edges of my legs, wings, and abdomen before hardening it to be like stone. And then I… stood there? Wow, I’m… a rock. This… is actually kinda boring. Alright, how do I turn this off?

Wait seriously, how do I turn this off!?!?! IT DIDN’T COME WITH INSTRUCTIONS TO TURN IT OFF!?!?! Uhhh. Calm down! Like a rock! Wait no! Not like a rock! I DON’T WANT TO BE A ROCK ANYMORE! SOMEONE HELP ME! SPIDERS! PLEASE! I’M STUCK! GET ME OUT OF HERE! PLEASE! THIS ISN'T FAIR! I WANT TO BE FREE! LET ME MOVE! I DON’T WANT TO BE A ROCK ANYMORE! I’m… free? Huh? What just happened?

It just turned off. I don't think I did anything… Doesn’t matter! I am never using that skill again. Ugh. That is honestly terrifying. I don’t like being a rock. Moving is nice. Yeah, I should get a new calming method… What can I use instead of like a rock? Like a tree? Yeah! Let’s try that. Trees are at least alive. They are way better than rocks. I will be like a tree from now on! Nothing but a bad storm or a saw will bring me down! Like a tree!

Skill Like a Tree obtained.

…Alright system, I’ll hear you out. What does Like a Tree do?

Like a Tree:

Take on the properties of a tree.

Alright. I give up.

comments.comment_text: hahah funny thanks for the chapter!

Should get into the mindset of everything for the easy skill. Like a Rock improves constitution, so Tree and other objects and creatures likely provide similar benefits. This could add/multiple quickly with enough skills.
After he becomes “one with wind” or something the skills can combine and be “one with nature”

chapters.name: 28. Boar Hunting
chapters.content:
Alright, so. I should probably get back on task. We need food. And the spiders will not come. So, what if I bring the meal to the spiders? Yeah, that makes sense. Alright, let’s go boar hunting! No, wait. Boar herding. Because I am definitely not killing any boars. Wait. I gotta be honest. Even if I find any boars, how am I going to bring them back here with taunting? I don’t think a boar is going to just follow a mosquito because it bit them. I guess I could try screeching at it. Yeah, screeching seems like a good idea. Alright. Problem one solved. Now for the more serious problem number two. How to find my way back?

Not that I am bad with directions, I just struggle to remember where I’ve been. Yes, it’s a memory problem, no problem with directions.

Hmmm… Hmmmm… Let’s see, what do I have? System, show me my status

Name: Mosquito Overlord, Mosquito of Death, or maybe just Tim

Gender: Male

Level: 1/5

Experience: 2/10

Age: 7 days

Expected Lifespan: 7 days

Race: Karen Mosquito(Tier 0)

Stats:

Health: 494/494

Mana: 64/77

Strength: 18.01

Agility: 23.0675

Dexterity: 18.71

Intelligence: 128

Constitution: 40.41

Charisma: 18.8

Skills(+)

Spoiler

Fly(Lv 8)

(Lv 5)Holy Flight

Like a Rock(Lv 5)

(Lv 5)Rocky Acting

Pray(Lv 6)

(Lv 5)Only My God Matters!

Spear Handling(Lv 1)

Aerial Combat(Lv 1)

Like a Tree(Lv 1)

Stolen from its original source, this story is not meant to be on Amazon; report any sightings.

Swarm Tactics(Lv 2)

Aura of Irritableness(Lv 1)

Piercing Flight(Lv 1)

Talk To the Manager(Lv 2)

Space?(Lv 1)

Bloodsucker+2(Lv 4)

Jobs(+)

Spoiler

Head Cultist Of the Mosquito God

EMPTY

LOCKED

LOCKED

Job Skills(+)

Spoiler

Lead Prayer(Lv 1)

Bloody Ritual(Lv 1)

Member Initiation

Protection of Blood(Lv 1)

Traits(+)

Spoiler

Super Fertile

Holy Crusader

Self-Named

Blanket Of Enemies

Blasphemy(Major)

Blood Born

Godly Caretaker

Mocked by The Gods

Monster?(Legendary)

Skill Researcher

Alright, open up those skills. Let’s see what we’ve got… Hmmm, yeah, there is nothing good there, at all. What about my job skills? Let’s see…. What about Protection of Blood? I bet I could leave a blood trail. Yeah, and it’d be easy to follow if I use Blood Born. Alright, I think I can do this. If I just activate Protection of Blood for a second then let it fall…. Ah ha! A small amount of blood on the ground for me to follow. I’m totally a genius, aren’t I?

Now! Off to find a boar!

…An hour later and I did it. I found a boar. Though it seems a little bigger than the one I found with the mosquitoes… Whatever. Let’s do this! So, I initiated my genius plan. First, I used Piercing flight to just get its attention. And oh boy did it get its attention. When I got here, the boar was just peacefully laying down and chewing on some bones that seemed suspiciously boar shaped. It had not a care in the world.

When I started my screeching, it stood up in an instant. I could swear I saw its eyes turn red for a moment before it turned around and looked at me. And for whatever reason, it seemed to think I looked tasty. Really tasty. I mean, it charged way quicker than I was expecting. It was right in front of me in an instant. So, I did the smart thing and flew as fast as mosquitoly (Hehe, see what I did there?) possible.

I flew for a solid five minutes before I made a realization. I FORGOT TO FOLLOW THE TRAIL! GODDAMMIT! Of course, by now it was much too late to go back and find it, as I’D BEEN FLYING FOR FIVE MINUTES! So, clearly it was time to restart, and I- Wait a minute…. Is that what I think it is?

At the edge of my vision, I could see what looked like a white wall of webs. And… I think I could feel my cultists in there (Did I fly in circles for an hour…?)!

I sped up a bit, wanting to get closer to hopefully a safe place. As I reached the wall of white, I.. uh. Kinda flew right into it. Again. But it wasn’t my fault! I could clearly see the webs like a foot in front of me, but where I was stuck there was nothing I tell you! NOTHING! Struggling in the webs, I could hear the hog approaching cautiously. It was clearly weary of whatever managed to just stick me in place. It got so close I could feel its breath on me. And ugh, That was not nice. Being as small as I was, its breath completely surrounded me, shaking the web a little as it came over me. Disgusting.

And, being in a pretty deadly situation, I did what always seemed to work before. Asked for assistance from my favorite god. Oh almighty Mosquito God, please don’t actually give me to Illinois when I die, I really tried to help the cult survive. At that request, I suddenly felt the boar’s breathing stop, and fell from the web. Into a sticky pile of sizzling goo.

chapters.name: 29. Spiders Suck
chapters.content:
When in the presence of evolved brethren, most monsters will choose between two paths. Some, will get much smarter, to help their evolved brethren lead, as a single monster can’t control an army on their own, while others will lose most of their mental capabilities. While the first path tends to make it much harder to deal with a group of monsters, as you can imagine it is much harder to fight an organized army than a mob, the second oath should not be discounted either. The monsters that lose their mental capabilities do tend to gain a decent bit of strength for it, and those mobs can do much more damage, as they tend to be much harder to predict.

-The Bloody Axe, Day 5 of Adventurer Training

I looked around, hoping to god I did not just fall into what I thought I did. Looking around, there was nothing else here but a few spiders sucking up the pool I was laying in. Oh god. OH GOD! I WAS IN A POOL OF BOAR! NO GROSS! GET IT OFF! GET IT OFF! GET IT OFF!

Assisted Blood Seeking Boar(Lv 9) kill + 10 exp.

Level up!

+5 stat points

Fly level up dexterity multiplier is now 1.08x.

Aerial Combat level up agility multiplier is now 1.01x.

I flew up, away from the threads and into the trees, trying to shake off the melted guts I was drenched in.

After five minutes and much less success than I was comfortable with, I came back to where my spiders had been lapping up the pool of dead boar. They were clearly done by now, as the lack of both a pool and spiders would suggest, so I was just left sitting in front of a massive wall of webs. I could feel my spider cultists in there, and they felt a lot less hungry than before. Clearly that had not been the only meal they found in my absence. I flew there, staring at the wall, wondering how exactly I could get into this safe? haven of my spider cultists. I flew there for a solid five minutes before making the decision that I most certainly could not. Those stupid spiders built themselves a home that looked pretty mosquito proof, and I could not help but wonder why they couldn’t just do this before.

Support the author by searching for the original publication of this novel.

I swear these dumb animals. They never would have been worried about food to begin with if they had this. It’s like these spiders can’t even think for themselves. They clearly knew what they didn’t want to do. No, let’s not go up. But they can’t think, oh, let’s build a massive web to lure in probably thousands of insects to their doom. I swear, all I told them to do was go hunt. BUT NO! Instead of coming to hunt with me, they build a web fortress. WHICH THEY SHOULD HAVE DONE TO BEGIN WITH!

I guess on the bright side, I probably wouldn’t have managed to convert them all if they had this beforehand… But still! Ugh!

Alright, might as well ask just in case. SPIDERS! PLEASE TELL ME YOU LEFT ME AN ENTRANCE INTO YOUR HUMBLE ABODE! At that question, I got absolutely nothing but confusion from them. Apparently, they thought I could just climb on the web to get in. Clearly they forgot something. I’M NOT A FUCKING SPIDER!

Alright! Wooo. I should calm down. I’m getting worked up at nothing. Be like a tree. Nothing can harm me but fire and a huge storm. Stupid spiders are a good thing, they keep my leaves clean of bugs that want to eat me.

What? No! I’m not actually a tree!?!?! WHY WOULD YOU THINK THAT!?!?! AND HOW DID YOU EVEN HEAR THAT YOU STUPID SPIDERS!?!?! Oh wait, I think I’m still… messaging? them. Ahem. What was I doing? Doesn’t matter. Siders! Make me a way in please! NO I CAN’T JUST CLIMB ON THE WEBS! I GET STUCK TO THEM! MAKE ME A HOLE OR SOMETHING!... What do you mean you can’t? Oh, I see… The spiders sent me a picture of what would happen if they put a hole in the web. Let’s just say it was not structurally stable, and apparently spiders can suffocate. Hmm… I’m totally gonna have to live outside the web, aren’t I? Doesn’t matter, I think it’s time to go to bed anyways. I’m getting tired again. But before that. I think I made a promise to someone.

Oh almighty Mosquito God, thank you for letting me not die today, as that would have sucked. Goodnight.

chapters.name: 30. Grass
chapters.content:
When I woke up, I was surrounded. By webs. Webs. WEBS! Goddammit they totally expanded, didn’t they? Now what? I’m trapped in a giant spider web. Spider Cultist web to be specific… Wait, normally them being cultists would make it worse, but doesn’t it make it better? Because they’re my cultists. Heh. It’s fine. I’m sure they have a way out… What am I kidding? They probably still think I’m a tree. Alright, what way can I get out…? I’m sure there’s still something I can do… Oh yeah! I can teleport!

To my cultists… who are also in the web… Huh, maybe that won’t work… UNLESS I TELL THEM TO GET OUT OF THE WEB! HAHA! I AM A GENIUS!

Alright spiders! I need you guys to leave the web for a bit! Yeah I know it’s not as safe outside the web, it’s just for a bit! JUST DO IT! I swear, why do the spiders lack so much common sense, but are so much less cooperative than my mosquito buddy was, bless his soul. Alright, I think they’re all outside of the web, now to pick a link and…

Oh, that is just as weird as the first time. Alright! Now you  can go back in the web you stupid spiders. Looking around, I realized… I was outside the forest… Oh god, how big did they make this web…? I refuse to believe they could expand it this much in a night. There were only, what, 200 of them? Looking around, instead of the barren landscape I had seen before, I was somewhere new… I’m sorry, did they encompass the whole forest…? Oh god. I might’ve caused a problem… Maybe a disaster… Oh well, Elly’s fault! It’s not like  there were any people in this forest anyways, hopefully. Other than my ex-cultist… AHEM! There was nobody in the forest. Nobody at all. Yup.

So, I was now inside a nice little plain biome, with purple grass… Whatever, it’s better than red. Yeah, I’ve had enough blood. It’s time for something new!

If you stumble upon this narrative on Amazon, it's taken without the author's consent. Report it.

Status Poisoned(Major) resisted.

…What? I DIDN’T EVEN EAT ANYTHING THIS TIME! WHAT JUST TRIED TO POISON ME!?!?!? I looked around, but as you could guess. There was literally nothing but grass, grass, and more grass. Really tall grass… Actually, is it getting taller? I flew there in horror as I realized I could actually see the grass growing at a visible rate. I mean, it wasn’t too quick, only a few millimeters every second, but that was still definitely alarming. It would probably be taller than the trees within a day! I flew away quickly, definitely not wanting to be stuck in suspicious grass that should not be growing so quickly…

But as I flew, the grass kept getting taller around me. Only the grass around me… wait what? I turned around quickly to see, and the grass that I had passed was taller than the rest, if only by a little. The weirdest part was that the grass started actually… ungrowing? When I got away from it. Oh god. This grass totally wants to eat me, doesn’t it!?!??! Uh no! I don’t like this! THERE IS LITERALLY NOWHERE TO GO! I can’t go back to the forest, as it is literally just covered in webs, and there is evil, possibly hungry grass around me, which, as far as I can see, goes on for a very long time. And even if I could outrun it and find an end, then I kinda shirked my responsibilities and left all my spiders alone…

This is hopeless, isn’t it? It’s fine! It’s fine! I’ll just teleport back to the spiders again! They can’t all be somewhere so evil! SPIDERS! Spiders? What just happened!?!?! I CAN’T TALK TO MY SPIDERS ANYMORE! WHAT THE HELL!?!?!?!?

IS IT THE GRASS!?!?! EVIL GRASS HAS MIND BRIDGE CANCELING POWERS!?!?!? NO NO NO! I’M GOING BACK TO THE WEB!

I spun around in circles frantically, only to see no forest or giant web anywhere in sight. I was trapped, in the midst of a sea of grass. That was growing taller if I stayed near it and was probably poisonous. Oh god. I was actually dead this time. Nobody can defeat plants without fire, and I have no fire!

chapters.name: Interlude: Spider Infestation
chapters.content:
I kept walking after killing that damn mosquito. It dared to remove my connection from Illinois, and it paid the price. Everyone knows you never try to take a dog from its master, especially by force.  I walked for a few hours before resting for the night, I was close enough to the church to start a transmission tomorrow, and I could report a mission well done. Settling in for the night, I made a small camp, and got some fire going. The forest was much more eerie than before, and it seemed to be getting worse as time passed.

It was strange, it was like something was slowly disappearing from the forest but I had no idea what. That’s when it hit me. It was the sounds. The longer I stayed here, the quieter it got. The insects were slowly stopping their noises, and they were fading away into the distance. Getting worried, I started looking around. Insects slow down for almost nothing but disasters, and I did not want to be caught in one.

I realized I was slowly losing visibility in my surroundings, as a wall of fog approached me from behind. It moved slowly, but I could feel malevolence and hunger wafting from it. And it was not slowing down. It was probably a hundred meters away, but would catch up to me before the night was over.

This story has been unlawfully obtained without the author's consent. Report any appearances on Amazon.

I got up, preparing to leave and set up camp a little further before I realized something. There was something moving in the fog. The fog reacted weirdly to this, instead of seeing currents in it, it appeared that small lines in it were vibrating, forming a massive… The spiders. They were back.

What happened!?!?! We killed their queen a few weeks ago, they can’t have gotten a new one so soon. It would take months at the least, and even that would be nearly impossible. That heretic, he must have messed with them.

This was going to be bad, we don’t have anyone left in the area to take care of them, and at this rate they’ll start overtaking the towns in just a few weeks. Nothing good ever comes from heretics, causing problems wherever they go. This was going to be rough.

chapters.name: 31. Suicide
chapters.content:
I flew what I think was back towards where I came from, but there was no sign of anything there but more grass. The forest had completely disappeared, and I was abandoned in the sea of grass, with no cultists to help me. Alright it’s fine. Grass can’t hurt me, I’m a tree, with big roots that will steal all of their nutrients. Actually, can I steal their nutrients? It worked a little on the flytrap… right?

I flew down a little, towards the possibly murder grass… Uhh, this is a good idea, right? Alright, don’t back down! I landed on the maybe murder grass and- OH GOD IT BURNS! WHY DOES THE GRASS BURN!?!?! I quickly flew back up, away from the definitely murder grass. Looking down, my legs were half the size they were before… That’s… oh God. I LOST MY LEGS! I NEEDED THOSE! I NEED THOSE TO LAND ON THINGS! MY POOR LEGS! WHAT KIND OF GRASS BURNS OFF YOUR LEGS!?!?!

I hate this world! I wanna go back! Send me back! Evil grass was too far! Too far I say! I could forgive the scorpion spiders, but not grass that burns at the touch! Spiders are already evil, but grass has done literally nothing wrong! It’s just grass! HOW CAN IT BE EVIL!?!?!?! Actually… I’d probably be evil if millions of my kind were tortured on a weekly basis too… Maybe evil grass makes sense? NOPE! I can’t go down that route! I will not rationalize evil grass! Evil grass is too far I say! TOO FAR! I demand someone looks at this! Whose idea was it!?!?! Who thought evil grass was good!?!?!?

NEW QUEST AVAILABLE!!

Figure Out Who Made the Evil Grass!

Success:

Discover the original creator of the mysterious grass that burns at the touch.

Failure:

Don’t.

Reward(s):

This narrative has been purloined without the author's approval. Report any appearances on Amazon.

Rare Skill Plant Communication

Accept Quest(Y/N)?

…Yes…? I’ll accept. Probably. Who even gives quests? Actually, seriously, who delivers quests? I know I got a few from Elly and Mosquito God, but what about the rest? The system? Other Gods I don’t know about? System? Can you answer this? Please, I need to know now!

Processing Request…

…System? Hello? You there? Systeeeemmmm? Uh oh, I think I broke something. Uhhhh. I hope this isn’t that bad… Can I still see my status? System? Okay yup, that’s working just fine. I guess it just needs a bit of time. Hopefully… I don’t think that was a bad request…

Wait, this isn’t the time! I need to defeat the evil grass… Yeah no, I’m leaving this grass. I can’t defeat it! It’s the fly traps all over again… defeated by my lack of fire. Why Mosquito God, why!?!?! WHY CAN’T YOU GIVE ME FIRE!?!?!

Skill Burst of Flame obtained.

Could this be…? System! What does Burst of Flame do!?!?

Burst of Flame:

This skill allows the user to obliterate their body and soul to create a powerful inferno that can burn anything.

…Are you trying to tell me something, Mosquito God? I thought you liked me! WHY WOULD YOU GIVE ME A SUICIDE SKILL!?!?! WHAT IF I DIDN’T LOOK AT THE DESCRIPTION FIRST!?!?! ARE YOU TRYING TO KILL ME!?!?!?

It’s fine! It’s fine! I’ll just pretend it never happened! Yes! Mosquito God never gave me a suicide skill! It must have been Elly! Yeah! She probably hijacked my prayers! Yup, Mosquito God would never do that! Stupid Elly! I swear! I’ll get her back for this! I’ll… I’ll think of something later… I should probably deal with this grass first. As I was thinking, The grass had menacingly grown like ten centimeters. And was still coming up to get me. I bet it got a taste for mosquitoes after it stole half of my legs! It’s probably ravenous now!

I flew off to an area of grass that hadn’t grown yet, to slow down my definitely not so inevitable death. And the grass started growing over where I moved. How does it even tell I’m above it!?!?! It has no eyes! GRASS CAN’T SEE! Whatever! Evil grass doesn’t need to make sense! The fact that it’s evil already makes it make no sense. It being able to see is just icing on the cake.

chapters.name: 32. Up?
chapters.content:
Alright! What do I know? There was a forest next to me, but it disappeared, the grass can probably see me somehow, the grass is probably poisonous, the grass will grow when I’m under it, and it burns very well at the touch. Alright, I think that’s it… Now, we already decided I have no fire and I can’t drink its blood. I guess I should probably check.

I flew up for a bit going as quickly as possible in case it somehow made a difference, but at a hundred meters something changed. I went from flying up to being upside down in an instant, with the grass getting closer and closer by the second. I tried to flip over as quickly as possible, and somehow managed to before my inevitable doom. I was only a few centimeters away from the grass when I righted myself, and the grass seemed to want to correct this. As if it could feel my presence, it sped up from a few millimeters a second to a few centimeters. It was chasing me as I flew away from it, and It was catching up. After my fall, everything about the grass’ growth had sped up, how quickly it went up, its area, but not its degrowth rate. As I left the grass behind, instead of getting shorter again the grass just kept growing, leaving towers of grass behind me. I started going up as I flew forward, trying to stay above my rising floor of death. As I kept flying, I almost bashed into a wall of grass. It appeared out of nowhere, one second I was flying away, possibly outrunning the evil grass, and the next there was just a wall of it in front of me. I turned around quickly, only to find that behind me was completely clear? What? Doesn’t matter! I started flying back the way I came, but as soon as I flew a few meters I could see that the grass in front of me was taller than the grass behind…

Okay, something dastardly is going on here! I took a ninety degree turn to the right, and started flying that way instead. To my relief, this grass actually hadn’t started growing yet, and I probably had a few minutes of time to think before it caught up.

This text was taken from Royal Road. Help the author by reading the original version there.

What the hell was happening!?!?! Was the grass… learning!?!?! NO! NO! If it was learning it would have started growing out this way too. Clearly it was doing something else. But what!?!?!?! Wait a second… Turning me upside down, grass just appearing, my mental bridges being cut off… Cold the grass… manipulate space!?!? IS THIS SPACE BREAKING GRASS!?!?! What the hell!?!?! GRASS CAN’T DO THAT! THIS GRASS IS MORE OP THAN I AM! THAT’S NOT FAIR! It’s grass! I am being outdone by a plant! A PLANT! NOT EVEN A GOOD PLANT! BUT GRASS! THE WEAKEST PLANT IN EXISTENCE!

Alright! I need to deal with this quickly. If I don’t it’s going to wreck me. What are my options!?!?

…No. I can’t. Not again. But… What else can I do!?!?! I don’t have a choice… I'm gonna have to go rock again. If I’m a rock it’ll probably ignore me, right? RIGHT!?!?! Seeing absolutely no other option, I flew down a little closer to the grass so I would smash into the ground and break, and I… Acted like a rock. I fell down into the grass, obscuring my view… Uh oh. Wait, how do I get out now…? I was more trapped than before. While I wasn’t being actively hunted by the grass anymore, there was nowhere I could fly. Rocks can’t fly, I was practically a statue, I couldn’t even move my wings. All of a sudden, the ground started shaking. It was an earthquake! All around me, the grass blades were shaking like mad men.

Then, all of sudden, it happened. My cultist connections were back! Deciding it was a bad idea to stick around and find out what was going on, I teleported to a random spider, and started falling… through their web. I hit the ground with a thud, completely covered in webs.

chapters.name: 33. Strength
chapters.content:
Alright, that was something. I think I’m gonna avoid mysterious grass for now… It seems pretty dangerous.

Request Granted!

What request?

Quests can be granted from multiple sources. They can appear from specific actions being undertaken, predetermined by the system, a scribe, a higher being, or

Spoiler

REDACTED.

OH! THAT REQUEST! Or what? System? Are you okay? System…? Alright! I’m just gonna ignore that for now. Yeah, that’s probably for the best. Now then, how do I get out of this stupid rock skill? I really don’t want to be a rock… Huh? It ended? That was quicker than last time. Whatever. I’ll figure it out later. Because I’m trapped in these webs now! Get them off of me!

I tried wiggling around a bit, but my fall had completely wrapped me in webs. I was stuck in a trap, again. Goddammit. What am I supposed to do about this!?!?! Hey! Spiders? Can you get this off of me!?!?! NO I CAN’T JUST EAT IT!?!?! I TOLD YOU! I’M. NOT. A. SPIDER! Alright. I’ll figure this out myself. It can’t be that hard to escape from, it’s just webs. I’ve got a lot more strength than I did before, right? System, what’s my strength?

Strength: 18.01

Alright, yeah, there is no way I don’t have enough strength to escape from measly webs.Yeah, I can do this. I just did it wrong. Alright, instead of wiggling, I’m gonna try to spread my wings!

Inside my wings, I started struggling against the cocoon for real. I took all of my extremities, my wings, legs, and as much as I could of my head, and tried to move them to the best of my ability. The webs around me broke instantly, and I was free again, free to enact my will on the world. MWAHAHAHAHA!

The narrative has been stolen; if detected on Amazon, report the infringement.

Wait… didn’t I get trapped in these webs literally yesterday? I don’t think anything has changed since then, right? Oh… wait. I got three levels in Head Cultist of the Mosquito God… That was six points of strength… And had like what, twelve? Oh yeah, that definitely made a difference. You’d think twelve strength was good enough too, but whatever. I guess I don’t actually have a metric for how strong I am… I don’t even know how strong people are. Whatever, I’ll figure it out later.

Now then… I'm still in a slight pickle.

I’m in the middle of this stupid web. I did just break those webs though… I bet I can fly through them now! Hehehe. Who said being a mosquito meant I had to be as weak as a mosquito? I can level up! Mwahaha. MWAHAHAHA! Now! Through the web! I flew straight into the web, and… got stuck. Dammit. Why can’t I go through the webs!?!?! I LITERALLY JUST BROKE OUT OF ONE! I flapped my wings a few times and the webs around me broke… Seriously!?!? HOW CAN I BREAK THEM BUT NOT FLY THROUGH!?!?! Does that even make sense!?!?!

I spent two hours. TWO HOURS GETTING THROUGH THE WEBS! I flew a few centimeters, and then I had to flap my wings to break it. I left a gaping hole through the web where I went, my path being pretty clear. Wait, what? I turned around and the path in the web I had made had completely disappeared. Alright, spider cultists are magical too. So, where did I exit from?

Looking around, I was surrounded by… not grass thankfully. But something much worse. Something much. much worse. There were venus flytraps everywhere. Those darn monsters were mocking me. Staring at me from their field where they killed all kinds of insects, beetles, flys, mosquitoes. I will kill them. Somehow. I do have fire now… It might be worth it for this… NO! No, don’t think like this. I shouldn’t kill myself avenging my mosquito pal. He wouldn’t want that… probably. I wonder how mosquitoes feel about mind control… he never seemed angry. Or happy. Or actually anything at all. Huh. I guess mosquito pal couldn’t feel bad if he didn’t have emotions… Well, at least he probably wasn’t sad. That’s good enough, I guess. I’ll never forget you, mosquito friend.

chapters.name: 34. Mating
chapters.content:
So, what to do about the flytraps. I obviously can’t leave them there. It will be a massacre if I do! All those poor insects, dying day after day. I can’t stand that! That would be so wrong it’s not even funny. I’ll think of something, even if I need to sacrifice my entire day to do it!

I flew on to a branch hanging out over the field, and thought for a solid hour to come up with a plan of attack. It really is hard to come up with an acceptable idea when you’re as small as a fly and don’t have hands. I had to throw out ninety percent of them for a lack of hands, and then another nine percent for them being suicidal. But! I did it! I came up with a plan! I could use the scorpion spiders! Considering that they had strong enough acid to turn a boar into a puddle in practically an instant, why couldn’t they do the same to a venus flytrap? I can’t believe that took me so long to think of. But, in my defense, it’s because I don’t want to think of scorpion spiders.

The thought still gives me shivers. So, I called my spiders to converge, and got one. After thirty minutes. This web was too big… I swear. It should not take more than thirty minutes to traverse a web! That is definitely unnatural. So are scorpion spiders though… AHEM! Whatever! Spider! I have a very important job for you. You know what you did to those boars? I need you to stab something and inject that acid into them, but it’s not a boar. It’s those plants over there!

…What do you mean you can’t? I just need you to take out your stinger, and melt a plant! It’s not that hard! You don’t have a stinger…? What!?!?!? WHY NOT!?!?! Did it fall off or something!?!?! Oh, I see. I get it. Yes, that would be a problem. These stupid spiders.

So, not all of the spiders are female. Yes, that makes sense. I can get behind that. You probably need male and females in order to mate. Unless you’re something weird like a shark. They cheat though. Small things should be allowed to reproduce asexually. Whatever, I’m getting off track. Where was I? Oh yeah! I need the female spiders. Which are apparently busy giving birth. And dying… Wait a second. How many spiders are left!?!?!?! Uh, uh oh. No. NO NO NO!

Stolen story; please report.
